This content can only be used by a male Clavat character.

70050000021482.name: Chime's Crystal
70050000021482.intro: The beloved co-op adventure comes to Nintendo Switch featuring new content and enhancements to help you and your friends create unforgettable new memories!
70050000021482.description:
A memory crystal that lets you mimic Chime.

This content can only be used by female Selkie character.

70050000021483.name: Sherlotta's Crystal
70050000021483.intro: The beloved co-op adventure comes to Nintendo Switch featuring new content and enhancements to help you and your friends create unforgettable new memories!
70050000021483.description:
A memory crystal that lets you mimic Sherlotta.

This content can only be used by female Yuke character.

70050000021484.name: Mira's Crystal
70050000021484.intro: The beloved co-op adventure comes to Nintendo Switch featuring new content and enhancements to help you and your friends create unforgettable new memories!
70050000021484.description:
A memory crystal that lets you mimic Mira.

This content can only be used by female Clavat character.

70050000021485.name: Bel Dat's Crystal
70050000021485.intro: The beloved co-op adventure comes to Nintendo Switch featuring new content and enhancements to help you and your friends create unforgettable new memories!
70050000021485.description:
A memory crystal that lets you mimic Bel Dat.

This content can only be used by female Selkie character.

70050000021486.name: Layle's Crystal
70050000021486.intro: The beloved co-op adventure comes to Nintendo Switch featuring new content and enhancements to help you and your friends create unforgettable new memories!
70050000021486.description:
A memory crystal that lets you mimic Layle.

This content can only be used by male Clavat character.

70050000021698.name: Exclusive Player Icons
70050000021698.description: Stand out from the crowd with your own exclusive player icons.

70050000021702.name: Sonic Colors: Ultimate - Music Pack
70050000021702.description: 3 exclusive original game remixes to set the pace for you while you put an end to Dr. Eggman

70050000022290.name: Retailer Exclusive Icons
70050000022290.description: Stand out from the crowd with these 4 exclusive icons.

70050000022316.name: Minecraft Dungeons: Howling Peaks
70050000022316.description:
A strange power has corrupted the once lonely peaks of a distant mountain range, and now it threatens to take the world by storm. The trek to the top features dramatic highs and lows, from dazzling new armour, weapons, and artifacts to vicious new foes among the cliffs. New enemies such as the Squall Golem and Mountaineer wait at the summit for anyone brave enough to steal the root of their power. Atop it all is the source of the stormy conflict, the Tempest Golem, which must be defeated before all hope is blown away.
- Explore three exciting new missions.
- Encounter new terrifying mobs.
- Take down the Tempest Golem.
- Hold your ground against sweeping winds.
- New weapons, armour, and artifacts.

70050000022552.name: Minecraft Dungeons: Flames of the Nether
70050000022552.description:
Minecraft Dungeons is bringing the heat with the newest DLC, Flames of the Nether! Journey to the
heart of the Nether in six new missions that will let you explore familiar biomes in an all-new way.
The adventure ahead will bring new artifacts, weapons, and gear for those who are brave enough to
face the fiery wrath of the Nether’s dangerous mobs. Not everything is scary and out to get you,
since you’ll also get the new Baby Ghast pet along with two new skins! Make sure you have the
latest DLC and don’t miss out on the most ambitious Minecraft Dungeons content so far.

- Six new Nether missions
- Take down new enemies from the Nether
- New weapons, gear, and artifacts
- Two new skins and a Baby Ghast pet

70050000022553.name: Minecraft Dungeons: Hidden Depths
70050000022553.description:
Dive into your next adventure with the new Minecraft Dungeons: Hidden Depths DLC! A shard from the Orb of Dominance carried on a dark current now awakens creatures that have long slumbered beneath the waves. It's up to you to free the tides from the undertow of corruption. Legions of sunken and drowned enemies lurk among the lost treasures, so you must remain vigilant under pressure. The ocean's natural beauty can distract from the dangers of the deep, but new weapons, gear, and artifacts will make everything go swimmingly.

- Three new underwater missions
- A mix of salty new mobs and enemies
- New weapons, gear, and artifacts 
- Two new skins and a baby turtle pet

70050000022554.name: Minecraft Dungeons: Echoing Void
70050000022554.description:
"You’ve followed the story of the Arch-Illager and found the shards from the Orb of Dominance, and now it’s time to get to the End. Reach the conclusion of the Minecraft Dungeons story with the newest DLC – Echoing Void! Face new enemies, collect gear, and make your way through challenging missions to end this fight for good. It can be scary to go into the unknown and face the End, but remember the real treasure is the friends you make along the way! The actual treasure is great too though.
- Three new missions
- All-new mobs and enemies
- New weapons, gear, and artifacts 
- Two new skins and a pet"

70050000022796.name: Asphalt 9: Legends -- Italian Pack
70050000022796.description:
Get a taste of some of the best Italian car manufacturers with 3 class-A vehicles from Ferrari, Lamborghini and Pagani. And boost your progression with Tokens and Credits, also included in this pack!
This pack contains:
• 50 blueprints to unlock the Ferrari 812 Superfast
• 50 blueprints to unlock the Lamborghini Aventador J
• 50 blueprints to unlock the Pagani Huayra BC
• 1,300,000 Credits
• 1,300 Tokens

70050000022867.name: Interior Design & Tool Upgrade Pack
70050000022867.description:
Customize the interior of your house with 5 fabulous designs! You'll also be able to upgrade your hoe, watering can, hammer, axe, and fishing rod an additional level, making growing crops, fishing, and mining easier and faster!

• Additional level for all of your tools!
• 5 Different Interior Design Sets: Farm, Castle, Steampunk, Spaceship, and Starlight!

70050000022868.name: Far East Adventure Pack
70050000022868.description:
A new chapter, new characters, and even new crops await you in the Far East Adventure Pack! Unlock an entire island! Explore the exotic land of Wagashi! Woo the locals! Meet new animals!

• Play though an entire new chapter in the game as you explore exotic Wagashi!
• Woo a new bachelor and bachelorette: the stoic Shogen and the cheery Sana!
• Plant new crops like rice, chop down bamboo trees, and meet some amazing new animals!

70050000022869.name: Precious Pets Pack
70050000022869.description: From Siamese cats to silver dapple horses, the Precious Pets Pack includes 12 unique animals that will love settling down on your farm!

70050000022870.name: Mythical Wild Animals Pack
70050000022870.description: Chocolate mint tigers and lava rabbits, oh my! Those are just two of the 10 fanciful wild animals you'll unlock in the Mythical Wild Animals Pack!

70050000023082.name: MONSTER HUNTER RISE Pre-order bonus Add-on Content
70050000023082.intro: MONSTER HUNTER RISE Pre-order bonus content
70050000023082.description:
- Palamute Golden Retriever Costume layered armor
Gives your Palamute companion the appearance of a gorgeous Golden Retriever! Good boy!

- Palico Forest Cat Costume layered armor
Makes your Palico companion look like a fluffy forest-dwelling feline friend!

- Novice Talisman
An item which will assist you in the early stages of your adventure.

Note: Layered armor is a "skin" which changes the appearance of the character without affecting their stats and abilities.

70050000023105.name: FIFA 21 In-Game Commentary – Arabic
70050000023105.intro: A legacy in football excellence in FIFA 21.

70050000023111.name: MONSTER HUNTER RISE Deluxe Kit
70050000023111.intro: Our recommended DLC in a set.
70050000023111.description:
- Hunter "Kamurai" layered armor set
    - Palamute "Shuriken Collar" layered head armor
    - Palico "Fish Collar" layered head armor
    - 4 Gestures
    - Samurai pose set
    - Kabuki face paint
    - "Izuchi Tail" hairstyle

70050000023139.name: 【Costume】Creeper Outfit and Mask
70050000023139.description: This DLC contains the Creeper Outfit and Mask.

70050000023140.name: 【Costume】Pig Outfit and Mask
70050000023140.description: This DLC contains the Pig Outfit and Mask

70050000023141.name: 【Costume】Diamond Armor and Helmet
70050000023141.description: This DLC contains the Diamond Armor and Helmet.

70050000023142.name: 【Costume】Travis Outfit and Wig
70050000023142.description: This DLC contains the Travis Outfit and Wig.

70050000023143.name: 【Costume】Bomberman Outfit and Mask
70050000023143.description: This DLC contains the Bomberman Outfit and Mask.

70050000023144.name: 【Costume】Gil's Armor and Helmet
70050000023144.description: This DLC contains the Gil's Armor and Helmet.

70050000023382.name: The Outer Worlds: Peril on Gorgon
70050000023382.intro: The Outer Worlds: Peril on Gorgon is the first narrative expansion to the award-winning RPG from Obsidian Entertainment and Private Division.
70050000023382.description:
A severed arm and a mysterious message lead the crew of the Unreliable to the Gorgon Asteroid, formerly the site of one of Halcyon’s most ambitious and disastrous scientific undertakings, now a lawless den of monsters and marauders. Wealthy recluse Minnie Ambrose tasks the crew with finding answers about Dr. Olivia Ambrose, her mother and the doomed project’s disgraced director, but they are soon ensnared in an intrigue that will change the colony forever.

Key Features:
•        Intrigue and danger: Search an abandoned Spacer’s Choice facility and encounter a cast of new characters as you uncover the mystery behind the sudden cancellation of the Gorgon Project. 

•        New locations: Explore the treacherous canyons of the Gorgon Asteroid and encounter enemies that have been warped by science.

•        More science weapons: Discover three outlandish new science weapons, including the P.E.T. (Pest Extermination Tool), an exciting new melee weapon that draws in enemies for close-range attacks.

•        Expanded character customization and lore: An increased level cap, additional perks and flaws, wholly new armor sets, and several variants for existing gear. Plus, dig into the story of the Gorgon Asteroid with new Portable Phonograph audio logs that reveal the salacious secrets of a scientific experiment gone wrong.


A copy of the base game The Outer Worlds is required to play expansion.

70050000023513.name: ■Digital Version Preorder Bonus
70050000023513.description:
One of the weapons Link can use in the game. You can equip this for battle (paired with a Pot Lid), or you can fuse it with other weapons for stat boosts.

*This item will not be immediately available to owners of the package version of the game, but may be offered as a paid item at a later date.

70050000023630.name: Gilded Rabbit Helmet
70050000023630.description:
From the creators of Rock Band™ and Dance Central™ comes FUSER™ - a non-stop digital music festival where you control the music! Combine elements of the world’s most popular songs to create your own sound or partner with friends on epic collaborations, then share your amazing mixes and headlining performances with the world! #PlayFUSER

FUSER Features
- Play with a library of over 100 songs including tracks from the world’s top artists
- Complete challenges to unlock new skills and content in Campaign play
- Explore, discover and create incredible mixes and custom effects in Freestyle play
- Collaborate or Compete in Multiplayer with players from around the world
- Customization options to tailor the look and feel to your unique individual style
- Share your inspired mixes and mind-blowing performances in-game and online

70050000024362.name: 【Costume】Barret's Outfit
70050000024362.description:
A Mii Gunner costume of Barret from the FINAL FANTASY series is now available for purchase! Represent the leader of Avalanche well as you tear up the battlefield with the Gatling Gun arm and launch opponents to the stars.

This content includes
Mii Fighter Costume
・Barret's Outfit (for Gunner)
Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000024363.name: 【Costume】Tifa's Outfit
70050000024363.description:
A Mii Brawler costume of Tifa from the FINAL FANTASY series is now available for purchase! Unleash physical attacks like a true martial artist as you bring the fight to your opponents in this tank top and miniskirt combo. Strike out with Soaring Axe Kick to feel like you're unleashing Tifa's Limit Break Somersault!

This content includes
Mii Fighter Costume
・Tifa's Outfit (for  Brawler)
Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000024364.name: 【Costume】Aerith's Outfit
70050000024364.description:
A Mii Swordfighter costume of Aerith from the FINAL FANTASY series is now available for purchase! Lull your foes into a false sense of security with this pink dress and red jacket, then show them just how bold Aerith can be!

This content includes
Mii Fighter Costume
・Aerith's Outfit (for Swordfighter)
Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000024365.name: 【Costume】Chocobo Hat
70050000024365.description:
A Chocobo Hat from the FINAL FANTASY series is now available for purchase! Set your Mii character's color to yellow, and combined with the cute eyes and fluffy feathers of this hat, your opponents will live out their worst Chocobo nightmares!

This content includes
Mii Fighter Costume
・Chocobo Hat
Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000024366.name: 【Costume】Geno Hat + Outfit
70050000024366.description:
A Mii Gunner costume of Geno from Super Mario RPG: Legend of the Seven Stars is now available for purchase! Geno fights to restore Star Road, so show opponents what you can do as you fight your way to victory in Smash, blue cape fluttering in the wind!

This content includes
Mii Fighter Costume
・Geno Hat
・Geno Outfit (for Gunner)
Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000024390.name: UNO® Rayman Theme
70050000024390.description: One of the most iconic card games ever is now getting a dose of extra adventure! Excitement, surprise, and more await you in the UNO Rayman Theme! Enjoy lush, new visuals and create new strategies with four brand-new and original Theme Cards that allow you to swat cards back at others or mix up everyone’s hands for some unpredictable hijinks.

70050000024391.name: UNO® Winter Theme
70050000024391.description: Winter takes over UNO! Add some fun, cozyness and joy to your UNO deck with the Winter Theme. This contains new avatars, environment, and music for you and your friends to enjoy! A fun new way to enjoy your UNO game in the comfort of your living room!

70050000024392.name: UNO® Just Dance Theme
70050000024392.description: One of the most iconic card games ever is now getting a little bit funkier! Ready to get your groove on? The Just Dance theme is now available for UNO, bringing a new background filled with funky effects as well as never-before-seen Theme Cards that affect all players in a match, offering new strategies into the mix.

70050000024393.name: UNO FLIP!
70050000024393.description: Jump into a new UNO® experience with the UNO® FLIP!™ ! Rediscover the matching game you know with a double-sided deck that gives classic gameplay an exciting twist. Use the special Flip card to flip the deck and reveal an entirely new set of numbers, colors and Action cards on the opposite side! Play nice with the "Light Side" Action cards or spice things up with these "Dark Side" ones: Draw five cards : The next player must draw five cards and lose their turn. Skip everyone card : All players lose their turn. Wild draw color card : The next player must draw until they get a color of your choice (no matter how many cards they have to draw to do so) and lose their turn. Bring your UNO matches to the next level with UNO FLIP!

70050000024450.name: Dead Cells: Fatal Falls
70050000024450.intro: Take on two new levels and a boss as you dodge new traps, enemies and discover more of the lore of the island. This is mid game content designed to continue to add variety to your runs.
70050000024450.description:
Try not to fall as you wind your way along the sheer cliffs of the island’s coast. Explore floating shrines, infiltrate the lair of an outlawed secret society and learn the tells of a new boss. This is new mid game content for people looking for alternatives to the Stilt Village, Clock Tower and Time Keeper areas and their parallels.

The Fractured Shrines: Breathtaking views, kamikaze crows, spear-wielding snakes, sadistic new traps and an endless fall if you slip. What more could you ask for?

The Undying Shores: Not the beach you had in mind for your time off… Creepy lantern wielding wizards and their shovel brandishing minions. Not at all the holiday you planned...

The Mausoleum: A new humanoid boss with his own story to tell, tough pattern based combat and a magnificent setting for a showdown. 

On top of the new areas, enemies and pet sword, you’ll of course need new tools for killing and what we’ve provided here should be particularly effective.

70050000024559.name: Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 1 + 2 - The United Pack
70050000024559.intro: Skate in style and support a great cause.
70050000024559.description:
The United Pack includes an exclusive set of apparel, skateboard decks and accessories to outfit your Create-A-Skater character in Tony Hawk's™ Pro Skater™ 1 + 2. Each item was designed with the unique 'United' tie-dye pattern or camo pattern to make your skater stand out.

100% of net proceeds received by Activision for this special pack will go directly to funding non-profits that place veterans in the US and UK into high quality civilian jobs. This is a limited time offer that will end December 31st 2021 or once $500,000 USD have been raised for the cause, whichever comes first.

70050000024560.name: Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 1 + 2 - The Birdman Pack
70050000024560.intro: Collect a piece of skateboarding history and support the skateboarding community.
70050000024560.description:
The Birdman Pack includes a set of 10 unique skateboard decks from Birdhouse, Powell-Peralta® and a one-of-a-kind deck created by the Skatepark Project team for your Create-A-Skater character in Tony Hawk's™ Pro Skater™ 1 + 2.

Activision is proud to team up with The Skatepark Project, the nonprofit organization founded by Tony Hawk to develop public skateparks in underserved communities in the US. 100% of Activision's net proceeds from this pack will go towards supporting the nonprofit's mission to create more skateparks for youth in the US. This is a limited time offer that will end December 31st 2021 or once $500,000 USD have been raised for the cause, whichever comes first.

70050000024643.name: Fitness Boxing 2: Rhythm & Exercise No Mercy intensity: Evan
70050000024643.description:
A new exercise intensity has been added for Evan! 

Now you can try Low, High, and the new No Mercy intensity. 
The instructor you know as good-natured and mellow will show you his ruthless side. He’s ready to put you through your paces!

70050000024754.name: Fitness Boxing 2: Rhythm & Exercise No Mercy intensity: Hiro
70050000024754.description:
A new exercise intensity has been added for Hiro! 

Now you can try Low, High, and the new No Mercy intensity. The instructor you know as good-natured and mellow will show you his ruthless side. He’s ready to put you through your paces!

70050000024799.name: Gods Will Fall - DLC Part 1
70050000024799.description:
The island of the gods has been conquered and your clan of warriors have battled their way to victory, breaking the gods' grip on humanity.

Now the ranks of the merciless gods are swelled by the awakening of new evil in "Valley of the Dormant Gods, Part 1" - the first of 3 Gods Will Fall DLC episodes.

Perched on his mountaintop throne, Yaltogguth has watched your fearless warriors cleave his brethren from the land. Venture towards him with your brave fighters and welcome a new breed of warrior. Equipped with lethal gauntlets, the Brawler is perfectly suited to rip through the hordes of new minions your clan will face. 

Part 1 includes: 

- A new realm: a mountainous realm to explore with a new god to defeat -  Yaltogguth, the god of Eyes.
-  A new weapon class: the Brawler, equipped with gauntlets. 
-  Three new items: Blood Moss, Bone Quake and War Paint.
-  Three new skills: Agile Warrior, Momentum of War and Parry Master. 
- Warriors' Garb: new clothing items for your clan.

Valley of the Dormant Gods Part 1 will automatically update for those who own the Valiant Edition of Gods Will Fall.

70050000024801.name: Gods Will Fall - DLC Part 2
70050000024801.description:
Your warriors have fought bravely but the clashing of swords has awoken more evil from beyond in "Valley of the Dormant Gods, Part 2" - the second of 3 Gods Will Fall DLC episodes.

This second installment from the Valley of the Dormant Gods brings a crimson ravine of jagged rocks and is home to Gortainh, the god of Pain, an opponent who grows stronger as you grow weaker.

Your brave party is now bolstered with a new class of hero - The Javelineer. A master of ranged combat, they wield a cluster of short spears, able to hurl and retrieve them in a lethal display of skill. Combine this with new skills and items, and the fires of vengeance burn bright for your warriors.

Part 2 includes: 

A New Realm
A punishing new realm, home to a new god - Gortainh, the god of Pain

A New Weapon Class
One new weapon class - The Javelineer 

Three New Items
Call Of Morrigan, Lightning Rod, Spore Powder

Two New Skills
Second Chance, Destroyer

Valley of the Dormant Gods, Part 2 is automatically available for those who own the Valiant Edition of Gods Will Fall.

70050000024803.name: Gods Will Fall - DLC Part 3
70050000024803.description:
Slumbering in an upturned world devoid of time or place lies Anord Rith, a forgotten lord of the ancient age of chaos. Formed of three monstrous greatworms, she’s an adversary that's unpredictable with her multi-pronged attack style.   

In this final installment from the Valley of the Dormant Gods step, into the realm of Chaos where the stakes constantly change, and face a creature unlike anything that's come before. 

Part 3 includes: 

An Unprecendented New Realm
Enter the mind-bending realm of chaos, home to a new god - Anord Rith

Three New Items
Mead Horn, Life Rune, Whetstone

Three New Skills
Precision Striker, Best Foot Forward, Anger of the Clans

Valley of the Dormant Gods, Part 3 is automatically available for those who own the Valiant Edition of Gods Will Fall.

70050000024807.name: Gods Will Fall - Hunter's Head Gear
70050000024807.description: The thrill of the hunt runs through the blood of the clan and it is ritual for the trophies seized to be worn proudly and displayed for all to take notice. The hides of 5 exclusive beasts; a wolf, bear, boar, fox and badger are fit to be worn by any warrior and shall act as an emblazoned warning to the gods that the hunt is indeed on. The Hunter's Head Gear is assigned at random in each new game playthrough.

70050000025041.name: Scenario [The Fall of Shu Han]
70050000025041.description:
An additional scenario that can be played with the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

Note: Limited free distribution until　February 24, 2021!
Note: This content will not be released as paid DLC in the future.

▼Added scenario
The Fall of Shu Han 

Background:
Shu's national resources were exhausted after Jiang Wei, who had been using Hanzhong as his base, launched a series of northern expeditions. Meanwhile in Wei, after the "Incident at the Gaoping Tombs", the Sima clan had risen to power. After taking control, Sima Zhao views the chaos in Shu as an opportunity, and orders Zhong Hui and Deng Ai to conquer Shu. The Three Kingdoms that had thrived for so long were about to end.

70050000025042.name: Scenario [Battle of Yiling]
70050000025042.description:
Additional scenario available for play with "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

Liu Bei is victorious in the fierce battle at Hanzhong, but loses Guan Yu to the betrayal of Sun Quan. Soon after his anger turned to Wu, Zhang Fei is murdered. Because Cao Pi had abolished the Han dynasty, this would have been the perfect time to justify an attack on Wei. However, Liu Bei chooses to attack Wu for revenge instead. In his thirst for revenge, the words of caution from Zhao Yun and Zhuge Liang could no longer reach Liu Bei's ears.

Note: Limited free distribution until　February 24, 2021!
Note: This content will not be released as paid DLC in the future.

70050000025066.name: ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass
70050000025066.description:
[Content included with this product]
 - Season Pass

Note: The "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle" game software is required separately.

[Season Pass Content]
*Release date for all contents: February 11, 2021
RTK 13 Officer Face CG Set 
Editor - Historical Officers
Scenario [Battle of Tong Gate] & Event Set
Difficulty [Veteran] & Scenario Settings Set
BGM Editor & Bonus BGM Set
Scenario [The Lu Bu Campaign] & Event Set
Game Editors
Scenario  [Hebei Conflict] & Event Set
Scenario  [The Battle of Hefei] & Event Set
[Extreme] Difficulty & Scenario Settings Set
Scenario [Conflict among Clans] 
Scenario [A Yellow Sky] 
Scenario [Gongsun Zan: the Hero of Hebei] 

Note: For details about the DLC released with the Season Passes, please visit the official website.(https://www.koeitecmoamerica.com/rtk14)

Note: Contents of the Season Pass are available as individual DLC releases. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

70050000025067.name: Scenario [The Wavering Han Dynasty] & Event Set
70050000025067.description:
A set that includes an additional scenario and events that can be played with "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

Note: This product is included in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass 2". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

▼Added scenario
The Wavering Han Dynasty

Background:
Shortly after the Yellow Turban Rebellion ended, revolts occurred against the Han Dynasty one after another, and warlords were in a rush to suppress them. In Liang Province, Han Sui rebelled against Dong Zhuo and his men. In You Province, the army that Zhang Chun raised had been placed in check by Liu Yu and Gongsun Zan. In Changsha, after defeating Ou Xing, Sun Jian was establishing a foothold. Meanwhile, at the palace, He Jin and the Ten Eunuchs were spending all of their time on political infighting.

▼Added events
"Death of Emperor Ling", "Plot to Eliminate the Eunuchs", "Turmoil in the Imperial Capital", "Plot to Assassinate Dong Zhuo", and "Cao Cao Raises an Army"

Overview:
The events depict the chaos within the Han Dynasty, such as the political strife between He Jin and the Ten Eunuchs, the tyranny of Dong Zhuo, and more.

Note: Events also occur in other scenarios.

70050000025068.name: Editor - 4th Wave
70050000025068.description:
Allows you to create and edit original specialties that can be used in game with the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

Note: This product is included in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass 2". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

▼How to use
You can create original specialties be selecting "Editor" - "Edit Orig. Specialties" from the Start Menu.
The data for original specialties you have created can be applied to the game by selecting a scenario from the "Select Scenario" menu of "Start New", and then selecting "Have Orig. Specialties Appear" from the "Specialty Settings" menu. From "Edit All Specialties", you can set your original specialties to your officers.
You can also set or change which officers will have original specialties from "Settings" - "Edit" - "Edit All Specialties".

70050000025069.name: Scenario for War Chronicles Mode - 1st Wave: "Liu Bei Enters Shu"
70050000025069.description:
An additional scenario for the War Chronicles mode of the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

Note: This product is included in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass 2". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

▼War Chronicles scenario
Liu Bei Enters Shu

Background:
A scenario where the armies of Liu Bei, Liu Zhang, and Zhang Lu fiercely fight one another on Shu soil.
Liu Bei's army enters Zitong along with Pang Tong and allies, only to find themselves caught in a pincer attack from the north and south by Liu Zhang and Zhang Lu. Depending on what events occur, Zhuge Liang and allies will even be able to be summoned from Jing Province.
Liu Zhang's army holes up in Chengdu, which is protected by a solid gate. As its defenses are sound, deciding when to attack will be crucial.
Zhang Lu's army in Hanzhong aims to take advantage of the situation, but their success will depend on the movements of Ma Chao.

70050000025070.name: Scenario [The Rise of Cao Cao] & Event Set
70050000025070.description:
A set that includes an additional scenario and events that can be played with the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

Note: This product is included in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass 2". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

▼Added scenario
The Rise of Cao Cao

Background:
Cao Cao and Lu Bu battled at Zhongyuan, and the defeated Lu Bu was forced to fall back and seek the aid of Liu Bei in Xu. At Jiangdong, Sun Ce expanded his forces with an all-out attack. Meanwhile, as Li Jue, Guo Si, and other remnants of Dong Zhuo's force were disputing one another, Emperor Xian fled from Chang'an and returned to Luoyang.

▼Added events
"Cao Cao Serves Emperor Xian", "A Wise Bird, A Wise Retainer", "Dual Destruction", "Unattended Home", "Lu Bu Strikes Again"

Overview:
The events depict the rivalry between the lords, each with an ulterior motive, such as Cao Cao gaining power by serving Emperor Xian, Lu Bu betraying Liu Bei under the pretext of Cao Cao's plot, and more.

Note: Events also occur in other scenarios.

70050000025072.name: The Outer Worlds: Murder on Eridanos
70050000025072.intro: The Outer Worlds: Murder on Eridanos is the final narrative expansion to the award-winning RPG from Obsidian Entertainment and Private Division.
70050000025072.description:
Venture to the skies of Eridanos and unravel the grandest murder mystery in the Halcyon colony! Everyone is a suspect in this peculiar whodunit after Rizzo’s hired spokesperson, the famous Halcyon Helen, winds up dead ahead of the release of the brand-new Spectrum Brown vodka. Alongside your companions, travel across the floating islands of Eridanos and piece together clues using the Discrepancy Amplifier, a new gadget that highlights otherwise unseen hints. There’s more to this mystery than meets the eye, and it’s up to you (and your crew, if you choose) to solve the case.

Key Features:
•	Murder mystery: Suspicions abound, and it’s up to you to get to the bottom of the murder of Halcyon Helen, the most well-known celebrity in the colony. Use the new Discrepancy Amplifier, your key to solving the case, as it highlights temporal inconstancies not otherwise seen with the naked eye. 

•	A unique world: Travel among the floating islands of Eridanos, from the luxurious confines of the Grand Colonial Hotel to Rizzo’s colorful groves. But be careful about the smiling employees you encounter, as there’s something dark lingering under the bright and cheerful surface.

•	New weapons and character customization: Three new science weapons can be added to the player’s arsenal alongside weapon and armor variants to use while solving the case. And increase your level cap by three and employ new perks and flaws to create your most unique character yet.

The Outer Worlds: Murder on Eridanos is the second and final story expansion that can be purchased individually or bundled at a discount in The Outer Worlds Expansion Pass. 

A copy of The Outer Worlds on the same platform is required to play expansion(s).

70050000025100.name: Scenario for War Chronicles Mode - 2nd Wave: "Clash of the Warmongers"
70050000025100.description:
An additional scenario for the War Chronicles mode of the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

Note: This product is included in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass 2". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

▼War Chronicles scenario
Clash of the Warmongers

Background:
A scenario where the armies of Lu Bu, Zhang Fei, and Ma Chao fight one another to determine the strongest force in the Three Kingdoms period.
Lu Bu's army sets up the main base in Xiapi, with Zhang Liao and Dian Wei as subordinates. Consider increasing your movement speed once the dearest person replenishes supplies.
Zhang Fei's army is based in Shouchun, with Guan Yu and Taishi Ci joining the ranks. Once a warlord second to none in the era comes to your aid, use their intellect to the fullest extent.
Ma Chao's army have Zhao Yun and Gan Ning under the command, and its base is in Chenliu. A sworn friend will arrive as reinforcements and set traps around the main base to fortify the defense, so feel free to go out and attack.

70050000025101.name: ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XII Officer CG Set
70050000025101.description:
100 portraits from ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XII that can be used through the Editor. 
Enjoy numerous officer portraits from ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XII, including well-known officers such as Liu Bei, Guan Yu, and Zhang Fei, Sun Wukong from the novel "Journey to the West", and more. 

Note: This product is included in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass 2". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

▼How to use
Select Editor and then "Register Orig. Officer" or "Edit Historical Officers" from the Start Menu. On the edit screen, select Portrait. A list of the portraits will be displayed, and you can set the officer CG from the Special tab.

70050000025103.name: Scenario for War Chronicles Mode - 3rd Wave: "The Battle for Hebei"
70050000025103.description:
An additional scenario for the War Chronicles mode of the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

Note: This product is included in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass 2". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

▼War Chronicles scenario
The Battle for Hebei

Background:
A scenario where Cao Cao, Yuan Shang, and Yuan Tan fight to take control of Hebei.
Cao Cao's army enters the newly occupied Ye and is on the verge of cornering the armies of Yuan Shang and Yuan Tan. Numerous obstacles lie ahead to suppress Hebei, so be sure to overcome them with the plentiful military strength.
Yuan Shang's army is driven away from Ye and sets base in Beiping. Military power will drastically improve once reinforcements arrive from the Wuhuan.
Yuan Tan's army, based in Pingyuan, lacks in military strength. Keep surviving and wait for the right opportunity to launch a counteroffensive.

70050000025105.name: Sun Ce Pushing Forward Event Set
70050000025105.description:
A set that includes additional events that can be played with the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

Note: This product is included in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass 2". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

▼Added events
"Duel at Shenting", "Liu Yao Flees", "Taishi Ci's Word", "Yan Baihu Flees", and "Wang Lang Flees"

Overview:
The events depict Sun Ce, son of Sun Jian known as the Tiger of Jiangdong, following his father's intention and crushing Liu Yao, Yan Baihu, Wang Lang, and others with great vigor, as he rises in power in Jiangdong.

Note: Events occur in any of the scenarios.

70050000025107.name: Watercolor Painting Style Officer CG Set for Wei, Wu, and Shu
70050000025107.description:
15 portraits from the "ROMANCE OF THREE KINGDOM XIII" that can be used through the Editor in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".
Please enjoy the portraits of the famous officers of Wei, Wu, and Shu, done in the delicate style of watercolor painting.

Note: This product is included in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass 2". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

▼How to use
Select Editor and then "Register Orig. Officer" or "Edit Historical Officers" from the Start Menu. On the edit screen, select Portrait. A list of the portraits will be displayed, and you can set the officer CG from the Special tab.

70050000025110.name: Scenario "The Subjugation of Nanman" & Event Set
70050000025110.description:
A set that includes an additional scenario and events that can be played with the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

Note: This product is included in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass 2". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

▼Added scenario
The Subjugation of Nanman

Background:
Liu Bei, seeking to avenge Guan Yu, marches on Jing Province, but he suffers a crushing defeat against Lu Xun of the Sun Quan Force in Yiling and passes away, leaving his future affairs to Zhuge Liang. While supporting Liu Shan, Zhuge Liang once again arranges an alliance with Wu and prepares to face Wei. That was when the news of a rebellion in Nanzhong was brought.

▼Added events
"Zhuge Liang's Southern Campaign", "Zhuge Liang's Gambit", "Attacking the Heart", "Seventh Time's the Charm", and "Mantou"

Overview:
The events depict Zhuge Liang's exploits during his southern campaign to suppress the Nanman rebellion, such as the battle for Nanzhong between Zhuge Liang and the Nanman King, Meng Huo, and an anecdote about the origin of mantou.

Note: Events also occur in other scenarios.

70050000025111.name: Scenario for War Chronicles Mode - 4th Wave: "The Battle for Wu"
70050000025111.description:
An additional scenario for the War Chronicles mode of the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

Note: This product is included in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass 2". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

▼War Chronicles scenario
The Battle for Wu

Background:
The battle between Jin, aspiring to unify China by subjugating Wu, and the self-defending Wu.
Wei and Shu have already fallen, and only Wu out of the three kingdoms is left.
Jin aims to capture Wu's land from all directions with their overwhelming power. Among them are some who remain cautious and prudent, but focus on overpowering Wu with the unstoppable momentum.
Wu is clearly inferior to Jin, with not much men, military strength, and morale within their territory. Rebuild the nation as quickly as possible and use any slightest opportunity to strike back at Jin.

70050000025113.name: "Zhuge Liang's Northern Campaign" Event Set
70050000025113.description:
A set that includes additional events that can be played with the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

Note: This product is included in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass 2". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

▼Added events
"Prodigy of Tianshui", "Jiang Wei Swears Fealty", "Wang Lang's Outrage", "Battle of Jieting", and "Mournful Execution"

Overview:
The events depict Zhuge Liang's northern campaign, one which he had started in order to fulfill the wishes of late Liu Bei. During the events, Zhuge Liang meets Jiang Wei, the prodigy of Tianshui, takes part in a debate with Wang Lang, battles over Jieting, the vital ground for the campaign, and more.

Note: Events also occur in other scenarios.

70050000025115.name: "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIII" Officer CG Set - 2nd Wave
70050000025115.description:
100 portraits from the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIII" that can be used through the Editor in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".
For the 2nd Wave, new illustrations such as Taishi Ci, Deng Ai, and Lu Lingqi in combat will be added. Portraits of famous officers with different occupation or age will also become available, including Zhuge Liang as a free officer, Huang Zhong and Lu Meng in their younger days, Yuan Shu as an emperor, and more. 

Note: This product is included in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass 2". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

▼How to use
Select Editor and then "Register Orig. Officer" or "Edit Historical Officers" from the Start Menu. On the edit screen, select Portrait. A list of the portraits will be displayed, and you can set the officer CG from the Special tab.

70050000025117.name: Scenario for War Chronicles Mode - 5th Wave: "The Battle for Yan Province"
70050000025117.description:
An additional scenario for the War Chronicles mode of the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

Note: This product is included in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass 2". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

▼War Chronicles scenario
The Battle for Yan Province

Background:
A battle between Cao Cao, who aims to reclaim Yan Province, and Lu Bu, who wishes to make it his foothold from which he can expand his forces. Cao Cao has given up on invading Xu Province and set up base in Xiaopei. Despite the abundance of men, they are in a tough situation due to their weak foundation. Aim to reclaim Puyang and rebuild the force at first. Lu Bu currently has great momentum, having conquered most parts of Yan Province with the support of Chen Gong, Zhang Miao, Zhang Chao and others. Use Lu Bu's invincible might to its full potential to swiftly annihilate Cao Cao's army.

70050000025119.name: "The Subjugation of Southern Jing Province" Event Set
70050000025119.description:
A set that includes additional events that can be played with the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

Note: This product is included in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass 2". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

▼Added events
"The Battle at Jiangling", "The Loaning of Jing Province", "The Subjugation of Lingling", "The Subjugation of Guiyang and Wuling", and "The Subjugation of Changsha"

Overview:
The events depict the state of affairs after the Battle of Chibi, where the armies of Sun Quan, Cao Cao, and Liu Bei each have their own intention to capture Jiangling, the heart of Jing Province. The events also illustrate how the brave warriors of Liu Bei's army, such as Guan Yu, Zhang Fei, and Zhao Yun, distinguished themselves as they aim to subjugate Southern Jing.

Note: Events also occur in other scenarios.

70050000025121.name: "Ryza and Her Friends" Officer Data
70050000025121.description:
Data that enables new officers for "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".
Note: Officer data added with this DLC cannot be edited.

Six characters such as Ryza and Klaudia will be available in "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle" with unique "Traits"! To have them serve under an officer, or have them establish their own forces and defeat other heroes, the choice is yours. The alchemists will add flair to your adventure in the world of the Three Kingdoms.

▼Additional officers
Ryza, Lent, Tao, Klaudia, Empel, Lila

▼How to Use
After selecting a scenario from "Start New->Select Scenario" screen, at the "Manage Orig. Officers" screen, use "Introduce Orig. Officer" to select an officer.

70050000025123.name: Ancient Officer Data Set
70050000025123.description:
Officer data that can be used to introduce ancient officers into the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle" scenario you choose to play.
Note: Officer data added by this DLC cannot be edited.

A total of 29 renowned and powerful figures taken from throughout the history of China is included in this set. Enjoy playing "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle" using famous powerful heroes and warlords from history.

▼How to Use
After selecting a scenario from "Start New->Select Scenario" screen, at the "Manage Orig. Officers" screen, use "Introduce Orig. Officer" to select an officer.

70050000025125.name: Legend of the Galactic Heroes Collab: Reinhard & Yang
70050000025125.description:
Data that enables new officers for "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".
Note: Officer data added by this DLC cannot be edited.

As a collaboration with the anime "Legend of the Galactic Heroes" and "Legend of the Galactic Heroes: Die Neue These" that are based on Yoshiki Tanaka's renowned Sci-fi novel, the Galactic Empire's Reinhard and the Free Planets Alliance's Yang are added.
Reinhard was hailed as the "invincible hero" and "genius of war", while Yang was known as "Yang the Magician" and "Miracle Yang". 

▼Added characters
Reinhard, Yang

▼How to Use
After selecting a scenario from "Start New->Select Scenario" screen, at the "Manage Orig. Officers" screen, use "Introduce Orig. Officer" to select an officer.

70050000025127.name: "Legend of the Galactic Heroes" Collab: Kircheis & Julian
70050000025127.description:
Data that enables new officers for "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".
Note: Officer data added with this DLC cannot be edited.
Note: Limited free distribution until　February 24, 2021!
Note: This content will not be released as paid DLC in the future.

As a collaboration with characters from the anime "Legend of the Galactic Heroes" and "Legend of the Galactic Heroes: Die Neue These" that are based on Yoshiki Tanaka's renowned Sci-fi novel, the Galactic Empire's Kircheis and the Free Planets Alliance's Julian are added.
Kircheis was Reinhard's devoted adjutant and right-hand man. Julian was Yang's protégé. 

▼Added characters
Kircheis, Julian

▼How to Use
After selecting a scenario from "Start New->Select Scenario" screen, at the "Officer Setting" screen, use "Introduce Orig. Officer" to select an officer.

70050000025129.name: "Legend of the Galactic Heroes" Collab: Empire vol.1
70050000025129.description:
Data that enables new officers to appear in scenarios for "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".
Note: Officer data added with this DLC cannot be edited.

As a collaboration with characters from the anime based on Yoshiki Tanaka's renowned Sci-fi novel "Legend of the Galactic Heroes", the Galactic Empire's Reuenthal, Mittermeyer, Oberstein, and Hilda are added.
Reinhard's elite subjects who worked behind the scenes to aid him on his path to conquest. 

▼Additional Officers
Reuenthal, Mittermeyer, Oberstein, Hilda

▼How to use
After selecting a scenario from "Start New->Select Scenario" screen, at the "Officer Settings" screen, use "Introduce Orig. Officer" to select an officer.

Note: Limited free distribution until　February 24, 2021!

70050000025131.name: "Legend of the Galactic Heroes" Collab: FPA vol.1
70050000025131.description:
New officers appear in scenarios for "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".
*Officer data added with this DLC cannot be edited.

Four of the Free Planets Alliance members and Yang's comrades from the anime "Legend of the Galactic Heroes: Die Neue These" based on a novel by Yoshiki Tanaka are added to the game. Look forward to their exploits in the world of "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

▼Added
Cazerne, Schonkopf, Frederica, and Attemborough

▼Use
Select a scenario from Start New - Select Scenario screen, then select an officer from Introduce Orig. Officer on the Officer Settings screen to have them appear in-game.
From Position Orig. Officers, by placing the officer on a base, or having them serve a force, they will appear in-game.

Note: Limited free distribution until　February 24, 2021!

70050000025133.name: "Legend of the Galactic Heroes" Collab: Galactic Empire vol.2 & FPA vol.2
70050000025133.description:
New officers appear in scenarios for "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".
Note: Officer data added with this DLC cannot be edited.
Note: Limited free distribution until　February 24, 2021!

Bittenfeld, Ovlesser, Annerose, and Braunschweig from the Galactic Empire, as well as Bewcock, Poplin, Falk, and Trunicht from the Free Planets Alliance from the anime "Legend of the Galactic Heroes: Die Neue These" based on a novel by Yoshiki Tanaka are added to the game. Look forward to the exploits of men and women who carved their names in galactic history along with Reinhard and Yang in the world of "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

▼Added officers
Galactic Empire: Bittenfeld, Ovlesser, Annerose, Braunschweig
Free Planets Alliance: Bewcock, Poplin, Falk, Trunicht

▼How to use
Select a scenario from Start New - Select Scenario screen, then select an officer from "Introduce Orig. Officer" on the Officer Settings screen to have them appear in-game.
From "Position Orig. Officers", by placing the officer on a base, or having them serve a force, they will appear in-game.

70050000025135.name: "Legend of the Galactic Heroes" Collab Scenario "In the Midst of an Endless Dream"
70050000025135.description:
A set for "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle" that includes a new scenario and officer data.

As a collaboration with characters from the anime "Legend of the Galactic Heroes" and "Legend of the Galactic Heroes: Die Neue These" that are based on Yoshiki Tanaka's renowned Sci-fi novel, a scenario in which the Galactic Empire's Reinhard and the Free Planets Alliance's Yang appear is added.
Reinhard was hailed as the "invincible hero" and "genius of war", while Yang was known as "Yang the Magician" and "Miracle Yang". Enjoy having the 2 heroes further their exploits in "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

▼Added scenario
In the Midst of an Endless Dream

▼Added characters
Reinhard, Yang

Background:
Reinhard the invincible genius and Yang the undefeated magician descend upon the world of the three kingdoms, where warlords compete to rule the land. They ally with some, and point their blades at others. The curtain raises on a new era where heroes have transcended time and space.

▼How to use
You can select Reinhard and Yang after selecting "In the Midst of an Endless Dream" from the Start New - Select Scenario screen.
Alternatively, after selecting another scenario, if you select Reinhard or Yang from "Introduce Orig. Officer" on the "Manage Orig. Officers" screen, they will appear in-game.
From "Position Orig. Officers", by placing either of the officers on a base, you can have them serve a force and more.
Note: Officer data added with this DLC cannot be edited.
Note: If you uninstall the "Legend of the Galactic Heroes" Collab: Reinhard & Yang Officer Data, you will not be able to play the additional scenario. To play it, please install the officer data.

70050000025136.name: Scenario [The Start of Change]
70050000025136.description:
Additional scenario available for play with "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

[Situation]
Shu had established the rule of Liu Chan, and Wu barely maintains the scale of their Force. But both don't have thier best officers. On the other hand, Wei is in the process of falling apart. The first one able to ready sufficient Force would likely be the victor.

[Scenario background]
A Shu without Zhuge Liang. A Wu with their government in continued turmoil. There was no longer any Force capable of opposing Wei. However, the guardian of the young emperor, Cao Shuang, had also seized power, leaving Wei in a mess as well. Feeling a sense of danger, Sima Yi claims sickness and retires to his home, waiting patiently for his chance. And now perhaps, another time of change was fast approaching.

70050000025138.name: "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIII" Officer CG Set
70050000025138.description:
100 Face CG from RTK13 for use through [Register Original Officer]. 
Enjoy numerous officer Face graphics from RTK13, the game that commemorated the 30th anniversary of the ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS series. 

[To Use]
Select  [Editor]-[Register Orig. Officer] or [Edit Historical Officers]  from the Start Menu. On the next screen, select [Portrait]. A list of the face graphics will be displayed. Choose the desired officer CG from the [Special] tab.

70050000025140.name: Scenario [Battle of Tong Gate] & Event Set
70050000025140.description:
Adds a scenario and events.

▼Scenario
Battle of Tong Gate

After the Battle of Chibi, Liu Bei focuses on suppressing Southern Jing province, while Cao Cao begins his move south by assassinating Ma Teng, with which he provokes Ma Chao to raise troops in search of revenge.

▼Events
The Murder of Ma Teng, The Letter with Blacked-out Writing, Liu Bei Enters Shu, Ma Chao the Wanderer, Ma Chao Surrenders to Liu Bei

As Ma Chao, the hero of the Battle of Tong Gate, you can enjoy the fierce battles of Cao Cao and the revenge-seeking Ma Chao and other famous scenes from the original novel.
Note: The events will also occur in scenarios other than Battle of Tong Gate.

Note: This product is included in the ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

70050000025142.name: Editor - 1st Wave
70050000025142.description:
Allows you to use a feature in which you can edit the data of historical officers. The edited historical officer data can be applied to scenarios within the game.

▼How to use
By selecting "Editor" - "Edit Historical Officers" from the start menu, you can edit historical officers or initialize such data. They can be applied within the game by selecting "Start New", selecting a scenario from the "Select Scenario" screen, and then selecting officers from "Apply Historical Officer Edits" on the "Officer Settings" screen.

Note: This product is included in the ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

70050000025144.name: Scenario [The Lu Bu Campaign] & Event Set
70050000025144.description:
Adds a scenario and events.

▼Scenario
The Lu Bu Campaign

In Zhongyuan, Lu Bu and Yuan Shu had joined forces, expecting an attack from the Cao Cao - Liu Bei army. Meanwhile, Yuan Shao and Gongsun Zan were about to clash at Hebei, while Sun Ce was building strength in Jiangdong.

▼Events
The Fall of Lu Bu, Chen Deng's Plot, Flood Attack on Xiapi, Battle of Yijing, The Sun Sets for the Emperor Impostor

With Liu Bei taking in Lu Bu after he lost to Cao Cao, Cao Cao and Liu Bei allying to oust Yuan Shu and Lu Bu, the battle at Hebei between Yuan Shao and Gongsun Zan, the fall of the fake emperor Yuan Shu, and more, the tales of the heroes are vividly depicted.

Note: Events also occur in other scenarios.
Note: This product is included in the ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

70050000025146.name: Editor - 2nd Wave
70050000025146.description:
A set that includes a BGM Editor that can be used with ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle, as well as BGM from ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XII and ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIII (a total of 88 pieces). By using the BGM Editor, you can enjoy changing BGM within the game however you like.

▼Added BGM
 - Pieces from ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XII: 35
 - Pieces from ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIII: 53

▼How to use
By selecting "Editor" - "Edit BGM" from the start menu, you can edit BGM within the game, or initialize the settings.

Note: This product is included in the ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

70050000025148.name: Difficulty [Veteran] & Scenario Settings Set
70050000025148.description:
The difficulty "Veteran" and Scenario Settings are added to ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle.
The Veteran difficulty (more difficult than Hard) and various scenario settings such as the "amount of Tactics Damage" and "whether Duels occur" are added.

▼Settings
Difficulty (Veteran)
Tactics Damage (Small, Normal)
Duels (Yes, None)
Surround&Conquer (Yes, None)
Effect of Neighboring Areas (Normal, Medium, Large)
Restore Durability (Small, Normal, Large)
Wounded Soldiers (Yes, None)
Wounded Officers (Yes, None)

▼Use
Select "Scenario Settings", which appears after starting any scenario from "Start New" on the start menu.

Note: This product is included in the ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

70050000025150.name: Scenario [Hebei Conflict] & Event Set
70050000025150.description:
Adds a scenario and events.

Note: This product is included in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

▼Scenario
Hebei Conflict

Background:
While Yuan Tan and Yuan Shang were disputing at Hebei over who would succeed Yuan Shao, who had fallen to illness, Cao Cao seized the opportunity to launch an invasion from Zhongyuan. At Jing Province, Liu Bei, who had been defeated by Cao Cao, headed to Liu Biao's location to begin planning his comeback. Meanwhile, at Jiangdong, Sun Ce had fallen, and his successor, Sun Quan, with the support of Zhou Yu and Zhang Zhao, set his sights on ruling the land.

▼Events
Surprise Attack on Wuchao, Fires Across the Shore, The Fall of Ye, The Decline of the Yuan Clan, Xushi's Revenge

Overview:
Famous scenes from the Romance of the Three Kingdoms are depicted, such as the Yuan Clan's movements after the Battle of Guandu, as well as events surrounding Hebei.

Note: Events also occur in other scenarios.

70050000025153.name: Scenario [The Battle of Hefei] & Event Set
70050000025153.description:
Adds a scenario and events.

Note: This product is included in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

▼Scenario
The Battle of Hefei

Background:
After the Battle of Chibi, the three kingdoms were at conflict with one another. Cao Cao had invaded Hanzhong and was building up power while his enemies Liu Bei and Sun Quan formed alliance to oppose him. Meanwhile, after Zhou Yu's sudden death, Sun Quan is forced to reconsider his strategies, but when Cao Cao begins advancing westward, he takes the opportunity to march an army toward Hefei.

▼Events
Death of Zhou Yu, A Banquet and a Blade, Zhang Liao Is Coming, Gan Ning and Ling Tong, Plot to Assassinate the King of Wei

Overview:
Famous scenes from the Romance of the Three Kingdoms are depicted, such as Sun Quan's movements after the Battle of Chibi, the Battle of Hefei, and more.

Note: Events also occur in other scenarios.

70050000025154.name: Editor - 3rd Wave
70050000025154.description:
Functionality that allows you to edit the data for forces, cities, and areas within the game "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

Note: This product is included in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

▼Editable Content
Forces
 - Rank
 - Kingdom
 - Doctrine Lv
 - Foreign Relationships
 - Alliance Period

Cities
 - Scale
 - Gold
 - Supplies
 - Troops
 - Durability
 - Morale
 - The tactics that can be set to cities

Areas
 - Commerce development levels
 - Agriculture development levels
 - Barracks development levels
 - Population
 - Public Order

▼How to Use
Forces, cities, and areas can be edited by selecting "Settings" - "Edit" within the game.

70050000025156.name: Scenario [Conflict among Clans]
70050000025156.description:
An additional scenario that can be played with "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

Note: This product is included in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

▼Added scenario
Conflict among Clans

Background:
The Scenario Contest winner from Japan.
Zhang, Sun, Wang, Liu, Cao, Li... The numerous clans that existed combined their officers to form forces and contended to rule the land. With clans such as the "Zhang", who boasted the largest number of personnel, including warriors such Zhang Fei and Zhang Jiao, and the "Sun", who had an abundance of capable warriors both in military and literary arts such as Sun Jian and his sons, which clan will be the victor?

70050000025158.name: Scenario [A Yellow Sky]
70050000025158.description:
An additional scenario that can be played with "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

Note: This product is included in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

▼Added scenario
A Yellow Sky

Background:
The Scenario Contest winner from the Asian region.
The Yellow Turbans had wiped out the Han Dynasty, and after they seized Zhongyuan and Hebei, when Cao Cao, Sun Jian, and Yuan Shao witnessed how impressively they were ruled over, they joined as subordinates, adding even more strength to the Yellow Turbans' personnel. Meanwhile, former retainers of the Han Dynasty in the surrounding area such as Liu Yan and Liu Yu were building up their lands and forces, and preparing to renew their attack.

70050000025160.name: Scenario [Gongsun Zan: the Hero of Hebei]
70050000025160.description:
An additional scenario that can be played with "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

Note: This product is included in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

▼Added scenario
Gongsun Zan: the Hero of Hebei

Background:
The Scenario Contest winner from the North American and European regions.
After Gongsun Zan wins the Battle of Yijing and conquers Hebei, he begins to greatly expand his forces. And although Cao Cao also had been expanding his forces in Zhongyuan, Liu Bei, who had formed an alliance with Gongsun Zan, was staring down Cao Cao. Meanwhile, Yuan Shao, who had been defeated in battle, rendezvouses with Yuan Shu in Runan, and the two begin making their first steps toward reviving their clan's glory.

70050000025162.name: Difficulty [Extreme] & Scenario Settings Set
70050000025162.description:
The difficulty "Extreme" and scenario settings are added to "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".
In addition to the additional difficulty "Extreme", with "Scenario Settings", you can enjoy changing various settings within the game. Adjust the amount of information shown for enemy units, the extent to which units are strengthened when linked, and more.

Note: This product is included in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

▼Added settings
Difficulty (Extreme)
Enemy Unit Info Display (All, Partial)
Link Effect (Small, Normal)
Officer Lineage (Historical, Fictional)
Cut Supply Line Effect (Small, Normal, Large)
Auto Range of Conquer (Normal, Large)
Enflame Damage (Normal, Large)
Morale Influence (Normal, Large)

▼How to use
"Scenario Settings" will be displayed for selection upon starting any scenario from "Start New" on the start menu.

70050000025201.name: UNO® Fenyx's Quest
70050000025201.description:
The most famous card game hosts a legendary showdown!  An all-new game mode inspired by the mythical world of Immortals Fenyx Rising™, UNO® Fenyx’s Quest plunges you into the marvelous Golden Isle and its mysteries and wonders. Avoid the traps of Typhon, free the gods from their curse, and wield their mighty powers to be the first one to get rid of your hand. Olympus awaits you.

UNO® Fenyx’s Quest brings a mythological touch to the classic card game experience with exciting new features centered around the cursed gods Athena, Ares, Aphrodite, and Hephaistos, as well as two exclusive Action cards, Typhon’s Trick and Fenyx Power. Take your seat around the golden board, meet the gods, and accomplish Fenyx’s Quest. You are the gods’ last hope!

70050000025753.name: Asphalt 9: Legends Multiplayer Champion Pack
70050000025753.description:
Dominate the Multiplayer Seasons by unlocking these high-performance power cars, including the 2-STAR Lotus Elise Sprint 220, the Pininfarina H2 Speed, and the Chevrolet Corvette Grand Sport. You’ll also receive a bundle of Tokens and Credits to help accelerate your progress.
This pack contains:
30 Blueprints to unlock the 2-STAR Lotus Elise Sprint 220
35 Blueprints to unlock the Pininfarina H2 Speed
30 Blueprints to unlock the Chevrolet Corvette Grand Sport
1,500,000 Credits
1,500 Tokens

70050000025833.name: Legendary Threads Set
70050000025833.intro: Borrow the power of the legendary Player himself with this set of equippable items based on the outfit worn by Neku in The World Ends with You!
70050000025833.description:
This gear set contains five equippable items once used by the legendary Neku. These items are normally unavailable until you proceed considerably far in the story, so they will give you a leg up in the early days of the Game, and provide you with powerful unlockable abilities that will serve you well until the very end!

・Legendary Headphones
Greatly increases the item drop rate.
・Legendary Tank Top
Greatly increases Attack.
・Legendary Shorts
Shortens the duration the wearer is knocked down.
・Legendary Sneakers
Increases movement speed during combat.
・Legendary Music Player
Enormously increases HP.

70050000025834.name: Reapers' Game Survival Set
70050000025834.intro: This three-piece item set will support your journey through NEO: The World Ends with You and help you make it out of the Reapers' Game alive!
70050000025834.description:
This set provides two items selected to help you survive the deadly Reapers' Game by increasing your HP and allowing you to heal up mid-fight. Also includes an arrangement of "Twister" that's sure to get you revved up and ready for combat!

・Pin: UFO Rescue
Hold the button to slowly restore your team's HP.
・Threads: Virupaksa Hoodie
Greatly increases HP.
・CD: Twister (NEO Mix)
Adds this song as a main menu music option.

70050000025841.name: Maniax Pack
70050000025841.intro: Reawaken your inner demon in a modernized version of the acclaimed ATLUS classic, Shin Megami Tensei III Nocturne HD Remaster.
70050000025841.description:
Relive the original version!
Adds a mode where Raidou Kuzunoha is replaced by none other than Dante of Devil May Cry fame.
*You can only select this mode when starting a new game.

70050000025842.name: Mercy and Expectation Map Pack
70050000025842.intro: Reawaken your inner demon in a modernized version of the acclaimed ATLUS classic, Shin Megami Tensei III Nocturne HD Remaster.
70050000025842.description:
Adds "Little Master's Mercy" and "Master's Expectation". 

"Little Master's Mercy"
Earn items that give you experience points in the extra dungeon "Where the Demi-Fiend was Born".

"Master's Expectation"
Earn items that give you money in the extra dungeon "Center of the Conception".

*You can access the dungeons from the Terminal after reaching Ginza.

70050000025843.name: Shin Megami Tensei BGM Pack
70050000025843.description:
Includes BGM tracks from various games in the "Shin Megami Tensei" series to use on the  map and during battle in the Vortex World. Change anytime from the Config menu.
*Available after reaching the Vortex World.

70050000025844.name: Merciful Difficulty
70050000025844.description:
Adds the MERCIFUL difficulty.
Suggested for beginners or those who want to enjoy the story.
Selectable at New Game. Also changeable at any time from the Config menu.

70050000025866.name: Pulse of the Ancients
70050000025866.description:
Wave 1: Pulse of the Ancients (Available June 18, 2021)

The Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity Expansion Pass kicks off in June with an expanded roster, newly added weapon types, and challenging enemies. Stop by the Royal Ancient Tech Lab to test yourself with new challenges to unlock weapons and new helpful features! Then, dominate the battlefield as the new playable Battle-Tested Guardian or try out the added weapon types—the Flail for Link and Master Cycle for Zelda. These new combat styles will come in handy in the new Apocalyptic difficulty and against added enemies like the bomb-throwing Moblin and a Giant Chuchu.

・Added character Battle-Tested Guardian
・Added weapon types—Flail for Link and Master Cycle for Zelda
・Newly added challenging enemies, including bomb-wielding Moblins and powerful Wizzrobe variants
・New challenges in the Royal Ancient Lab
・Apocalyptic difficulty

70050000025914.name: 【Costume】Arthur's Armor and Helm
70050000025914.description: This DLC contains the Arthur's Armor and Helm.

70050000025918.name: 【Costume】Felyne Hat
70050000025918.description: This DLC contains the Felyne Hat.

70050000025927.name: 【Costume】Hunter's Mail and Helm
70050000025927.description: This DLC contains the Hunter's Mail and Helm.

70050000025931.name: 【Costume】Rathalos Mail and Helm
70050000025931.description: This DLC contains the Rathalos Mail and Helm.

70050000025934.name: Guardian of Remembrance
70050000025934.description:
Wave 2: Guardian of Remembrance (Available November 2021)

This wave of the Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity Expansion Pass will bring new character vignettes, added stages, an expanded roster, and new battle skills for existing characters. 

・New character vignettes
・Newly added stages
・Expanded roster
・New battle skills for existing characters

70050000025935.name: Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity Expansion Pass - Purchase Bonus
70050000025935.description:
Purchase Bonus

・Prototype Ancient Short Sword for Link
・Prototype Ancient Helm, Cuirass, and Greaves for Link

70050000025989.name: Tony Hawk's™ Pro Skater™ 1 + 2 - Digital Deluxe Content
70050000025989.intro: Drop back in with the most iconic skateboarding games ever made.
70050000025989.description:
Includes:

- ‘The Ripper’ character from Powell-Peralta® - the iconic skeleton makes its debut in Tony Hawk's™ Pro Skater™ and comes with its own secret tricks and boards
- Unique retro 80s-era outfits for Tony Hawk, Steve Caballero and Rodney Mullen
- Unique retro content for the Create-A-Skater mode - boards, clothes, shoes and gear

70050000026094.name: Atelier Series Legacy BGM Pack
70050000026094.intro: Change the game BGM to the tracks from classic Atelier titles!
70050000026094.description:
Adds BGM tracks from other Atelier series titles (features tracks from “Atelier Marie”, “Atelier Lulua”, and others).

Note:
- BGM can be changed at the desk in the Atelier. 
- Please visit the official website for more information:
https://www.koeitecmoamerica.com/ryza2/

70050000026253.name: Ryza and Her New Friends Officer Data
70050000026253.description:
New officers appear in scenarios for the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

Note: Officer data added with this DLC cannot be edited.

Ryza, Lent, Tao, and Klaudia, all grown up after the latest adventure, will appear along with the new faces: Patricia, Clifford, and Serri.
Serri is highly suitable for fighting in forests. Clifford can trick the enemies, whereas Patricia can boost the abilities of the allies. Facing them, even the mightiest lords of the land will surely experience hardships.
You may choose to make them your subordinates to help unify China, or rather create a new force to defeat your rivals. A step closer to being an adult, please enjoy Ryza and her friends' adventure in the world of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms.

▼Added officers
Ryza, Lent, Tao, Klaudia, Patricia, Clifford, and Serri

▼How to use
Select a scenario from Start New - Select Scenario screen, then select an officer from "Introduce Orig. Officer" on the Officer Settings screen to have them appear in-game.
From "Position Orig. Officers", by placing the officer on a base, or having them serve a force, they will appear in-game.

70050000026282.name: FIGHTING EX LAYER ANOTHER DASH Full Package
70050000026282.description:
The following features will be unlocked after purchasing the "Fighting EX Layer Another Dash Full Package".

■Training Mode, Rank Match (Online VS), and Casual Match (Online VS) will be implemented.
■14 characters will be added.
■All character colors will be available to use.
■Spectator Mode (Online VS) will be implemented with the update scheduled for June.

70050000026443.name: SUPER BOMBERMAN R ONLINE Premium Pack
70050000026443.description:
This Add-On pack contains 14 additional characters equipped with special types and abilities, as well as the feature to create private matches with your friends.

Characters included in this bundle:
Attack Type
・Simon Belmont Bomber from Castlevania
・Pyramid Head Bomber from Silent Hill
・Raiden Bomber from Metal Gear Solid

Speed Type
・Alucard Bomber from Castlevania
・Vic Viper Bomber from Gradius
・Bill Bomber from Contra
・Lance Bomber from Contra
・Naked Snake Bomber from Metal Gear Solid
・Richter Bomber from Castlevania

Unique Type
・Bubble Head Bomber from Silent Hill
・Princess Tomato Bomber from Princess Tomato in the Salad Kingdom
・Mimi Bomber from Pop'n Music
・Nyami Bomber from Pop'n Music
・Robbie the Rabbit Bomber from Silent Hill

70050000026609.name: "Swallow Shirt" Hunter layered armor piece
70050000026609.description:
Hunt in style with this special layered armor!

After purchasing, speak to the Courier and select Add-on Content to receive the content. You will then be able to use it in the Layered Armor Settings menu of the Item Box.

Note: This item is cosmetic only and does not confer any status benefits.

70050000026620.description:

● Delightful Dance 1
● Delightful Dance 2
● Delightful Dance 3
● Delightful Dance 4

After purchasing, speak to the Courier and select Add-on Content to receive the content. You will then be able to use it from the Chat Menu.

70050000026621.description:
Enjoy communicating with other hunters and taking fun photos with this special pose set!

After purchasing, speak to the Courier and select Add-on Content to receive the content. You will then be able to use it from the Start Menu, or the Poses/Gestures Menu in the Camera.

70050000026622.description:
Change up your hunter's look with this special appearance option!

After purchasing, select Change Appearance in the Item Box to apply to your hunter.

Note: This item is cosmetic only and does not confer any status benefits.

70050000026628.name: BGM "Yukumo Village"
70050000026628.description:
'Enjoy different music in various places around Kamura village with this BGM!

- "In Search of Hidden Springs" BGM
- "The Hunters' Secret Spring" BGM
- "The Palicoes of Yukumo Ranch" BGM
- "Spark of Blue: Original Version" BGM

After purchasing, speak to the Courier and select Add-on Content to receive the content. You will then be able to use it in the Room Customization section of the Housekeeper menu.

70050000026629.name: BGM "Kamura Village (Piano version)"
70050000026629.description:
'Enjoy piano arrangements of the game's music in various places around Kamura village with this BGM!

- "Kamura's Song of Purification: Piano Version" BGM
- "Brave Hunters: Piano Version" BGM
- "Best Buddies: Piano Version" BGM
- "Making Yummy Dango: Piano Version" BGM

After purchasing, speak to the Courier and select Add-on Content to receive the content. You will then be able to use it in the Room Customization section of the Housekeeper menu.

Note: This music will not play during quests.

70050000026630.name: "Ace Pilot" Cohoot outfit
70050000026630.description:
Dress up your Cohoot pet with this special outfit!

After purchasing, speak to the Courier and select Add-on Content to receive the content. You will then be able to use it in the Change Clothes section of the Pet menu.

Note: This item is cosmetic only and does not confer any status benefits.

70050000026631.name: "Menacing Macaw" Cohoot outfit
70050000026631.description:
Dress up your Cohoot pet with this special outfit!

After purchasing, speak to the Courier and select Add-on Content to receive the content. You will then be able to use it in the Change Clothes section of the Pet menu.

Note: This item is cosmetic only and does not confer any status benefits.

70050000026632.name: One Character Edit Voucher
70050000026632.description:
'Character Edit Vouchers allow you to change the appearance of a hunter character once per voucher. Use a voucher at the save data select screen to edit the appearance of an existing hunter. Please note that the name of your hunter cannot be changed.

This add-on contains:

- Character Edit Voucher (1)

Note:
- This add-on content can only be obtained once.
- Each voucher is consumed upon saving the edited character.
- You can edit hair, eyebrow colour, facial hair, makeup and clothing from the Item Box without using a voucher.

70050000026633.name: Two Character Edit Vouchers
70050000026633.description:
Character Edit Vouchers allow you to change the appearance of a hunter character once per voucher. Use a voucher at the save data select screen to edit the appearance of an existing hunter. Please note that the name of your hunter cannot be changed.

This add-on contains:

- Character Edit Voucher (2)

Note:
- This add-on content can only be obtained once.
- Each voucher is consumed upon saving the edited character.
- You can edit hair, eyebrow colour, facial hair, makeup and clothing from the Item Box without using a voucher.

70050000026634.name: Three Character Edit Vouchers
70050000026634.description:
Character Edit Vouchers allow you to change the appearance of a hunter character once per voucher. Use a voucher at the save data select screen to edit the appearance of an existing hunter. Please note that the name of your hunter cannot be changed.

This add-on contains:

Note:
