70050000026635.name: One Character Edit Voucher (Free)
70050000026635.description:
Character Edit Vouchers allow you to change the appearance of a hunter character once per voucher. Use a voucher at the save data select screen to edit the appearance of an existing hunter. Please note that the name of your hunter cannot be changed.

This add-on contains:

- Character Edit Voucher (1, free)

Note:
- This add-on content can only be obtained once.
- Each voucher is consumed upon saving the edited character.
- You can edit hair, eyebrow colour, facial hair, makeup and clothing from the Item Box without using a voucher.

70050000026636.name: "Special Stickers 1" Sticker Set
70050000026636.description:
Have fun communicating with other players using stickers!

This add-on contains:

- "Special Stickers 1" Sticker Set
These stickers were designed by Azarasi Yuzuko, an artist who has drawn many Monster Hunter artworks! You can even edit the text that appears in the speech bubbles.

After purchasing, speak to the Courier and select Add-on Content to receive the content. You will then be able to use it in the Chat menu.

70050000026692.name: Monster Hunter Stories 2: Wings of Ruin Deluxe Kit
70050000026692.intro: Customize your Monster Hunter Stories 2 experience with this special add-on content.
70050000026692.description:
This kit contains a variety of additional content to enhance your experience with the game.

 ・ Ena's Outfit: Kuan Coat
 ・ Rider's Layered Armor: Razewing Armor Alpha ＆ Beta
 ・ Rider's Hairstyle: Spiky Nergal
 ・ Navirou's Outfits: Nergigante and Pukei-Pukei Costumes
 ・ Sticker Sets: Adventure Buddies 2 & 3

Note: This is the same additional content included in Monster Hunter Stories 2: Wings of Ruin Deluxe Edition. Some content will only become useable after progressing through the game.

70050000026693.name: Ena's Outfit: Kamura Maiden Outfit
70050000026693.intro: Customize your Monster Hunter Stories 2 experience with this special add-on content.
70050000026693.description:
This outfit lets you dress Ena as a hub maiden from Kamura village, as featured in Monster Hunter Rise!

Note: This content will only become useable after progressing through the game. Outfits can be changed from the box in your room in the game.

*Monster Hunter Rise rated TEEN

70050000026739.name: Worms Rumble - Legends Pack
70050000026739.description:
Celebrate 25 years of Worms icons with the Legends Pack! Customise your Worm with these awesome outfits, weapon skins and banners.

This pack includes:
6 Outfits – Retro Commando, Sheep, Donkey, Skunk, Cow and Pigeon (each with 3 different colour variants!)
6 Weapon Skins - Retro, Wooly, Concrete, Poison, Bovine, Feathers
6 Banners

70050000026740.name: Hot Wheels™ Booster Pack
70050000026740.intro: Boost your game with seven legendary Hot Wheels cars, four exciting new racetracks and adrenaline-pumping stunt challenges.
70050000026740.description:
Turbocharge your game with the Hot Wheels Booster Pack, an exciting new content expansion for Beach Buggy Racing 2: Island Adventure.

The Booster Pack adds seven legendary Hot Wheels cars to the Beach Buggy Racing League, including Rip Rod™, Bone Shaker™, Surf 'N Turf™, and Twin Mill™ III.  You'll also get four new race environments filled with looping orange Hot Wheels track and exciting set pieces like Volcano Blast and Hot Wheels Harbor. 

Ready for a challenge? See if you can collect the 27 Hot Wheels Stunt Challenge Medallions placed throughout the 1000HP race tracks.

Bring the thrill of Hot Wheels cars and tracks to Beach Buggy Racing 2 with the Hot Wheels Booster Pack.  Challenge accepted!

70050000026753.name: SnowRunner - Navistar 5000-MV Tractor
70050000026753.description:
Expand your SnowRunner experience with the Navistar 5000-MV tractor!

This Heavy Equipment Transport Truck is a powerful hauler that was used to transport tanks and other military equipment across dangerous and uneven terrain.

70050000026757.name: SnowRunner - Season 3: Locate & Deliver
70050000026757.description:
Expand your SnowRunner experience with Season 3: Locate & Deliver. Haul giant logs and bring old railways to life in the remote wilderness of Wisconsin, USA. Enjoy two huge maps in Wisconsin, three new vehicles, exclusive skins, unique missions, specialized logging addons, and more!

The Season 3: Locate & Deliver DLC is available as part of the Year 1 Pass and Premium Edition, or as a standalone purchase.

Season 3: Locate & Deliver includes:
• Two new summer maps in Wisconsin, USA, with the much-anticipated arrival of logging! Use the new grapples to load logs, rebuild train tracks, and power abandoned facilities in the deep wilds.
• Three new vehicles including the International PayStar Twin Steer, the Pacific P512 PF, and the BOAR 45318.
• New cosmetics, including three vehicle skins, and new stickers.
• New addons to load and carry logs, and a generator trailer to power facilities.

70050000026760.name: SnowRunner - Derry Longhorn 4520 Sabertooth Livery
70050000026760.description: Customize your SnowRunner experience with the Sabertooth Livery DLC, available exclusively for the Heavy Duty Derry Longhorn 4520!

70050000026763.name: SnowRunner - Loaded Dice Vinyl Wrap
70050000026763.description:
Customize your SnowRunner experience with the unique Loaded Dice Vinyl Wrap skin for the White Western Star 4964. 

The Loaded Dice Vinyl Wrap adds a set of flaming smoke-trailed dice to the side of your White Western Star 4964.

This custom skin is included for all Year 1 Pass owners.

70050000026766.name: SnowRunner - High Roller Pack
70050000026766.description:
Expand your driving roster with the High Roller pack, giving you the Khan 39 Scout truck and its alternate High Roller skin. 

The nimble Khan 39 Scout is a versatile Russian climber with both All-Wheel-Drive and Differential Lock capabilities.

This DLC is included for all Year 1 Pass owners.

70050000026769.name: SnowRunner - Season 2: Explore & Expand
70050000026769.description:
Take your SnowRunner experience to wild territories in Season 2: Explore & Expand, with two freezing maps in Yukon, Canada, three new vehicles, exclusive vehicle skins and a unique objective!

The Season 2: Explore & Expand DLC is available as part of the Year 1 Pass and Premium Edition, or as a standalone purchase. 

Season 2: Explore & Expand includes:
• Two new winter maps set in Yukon, Canada with brand new open-ended mission types: Scour the maps to locate resources and structures to disassemble, before crafting and delivering materials to build a huge, multi-part processing plant.
• New vehicles including the CAT 770G, the CAT TH357D AG, and the KRS 58 “Bandit”.
• New vehicle skins for the International Harvester Scout 800, the International Loadstar and more.

70050000026772.name: SnowRunner - Season 1: Search & Recover
70050000026772.description:
Expand your SnowRunner experience with Season 1: Search & Recover to discover a wealth of new challenges. This DLC gives you access to two brand new maps in Russia’s Kola Peninsula alongside new vehicles, missions, skins, and more! 

Delivered via three updates over the summer of 2020, Season 1: Search & Recover can also be purchased as part of the SnowRunner Year 1 Pass.

Season 1: Search & Recover includes:
• Two new winter maps in Russia’s Kola Peninsula, taking you on a modern-day treasure hunt for the remnants of a WWII bomber. 
• New vehicles, including the TUZ 16 “Actaeon”, and the Ford 750 4x4 CrewCab 
• New vehicle skins and interior cosmetics.

70050000026775.name: SnowRunner - Western Star 49X
70050000026775.description:
Tear up the dirt with The All New Western Star 49X, an additional vehicle for SnowRunner!

This modern heavy duty truck is a beast off the road and is no stranger to the mud. With its controllable extra axle, the 49X can navigate the worst road conditions while carrying all but the heaviest loads.

The Western Star 49X is not included in the Year 1  Pass or the Year 2 Pass.

70050000026778.name: SnowRunner - True Colors Vinyl Wrap
70050000026778.description:
Customize your SnowRunner experience with the unique True Colors Vinyl Wrap for the Chevrolet Kodiak C70. 

The True Colors Vinyl Wrap gives an American themed skin to the Chevrolet Kodiak C70.

This custom skin is included for all Year 1 Pass owners.

70050000026781.name: SnowRunner - Scorched Vinyl Wrap
70050000026781.description:
Explore SnowRunner in style with the unique Scorched Vinyl Wrap for the Chevrolet CK 1500. 

The Scorched Vinyl Wrap adds a fiery burst look to the Chevrolet CK 1500.

This custom skin is included for all Year 1 Pass owners.

70050000026784.name: SnowRunner - Clasico Pack
70050000026784.description:
Tear up the frontier with the Clasico Pack, granting you a new vehicle, the ferocious Chevrolet Apache 6x6, and its blazing blue alternate skin. 

This classic six-wheeled pickup can conquer all kinds of dangerous terrain, excelling at deep mud and water thanks to its unique weight distribution and sizeable fuel tank.

This DLC is not included in the Year 1 Pass or the Year 2 Pass.

70050000026787.name: SnowRunner - Season 4: New Frontiers
70050000026787.description:
Elevate your SnowRunner experience to new heights with the New Frontiers expansion, the game’s biggest and most ambitious addition, and the last installment of the Year 1 Pass. 

Rebuild roads, fuel lines, and various buildings to bring an old soviet rocket launchpad back to life in Amur Oblast, a huge new winter region with four 4km² maps. Using powerful new vehicles, haul the massive rocket to the launch pad yourself.

The New Frontiers expansion is available as part of the Year 1 Pass and Premium Edition, or as a standalone purchase.

New Frontiers includes:
· A new primary objective adding hours of gameplay through new missions to rebuild an old soviet rocket launchpad
· Four large maps in Amur Oblast, a new Russian winter region.
· Two new vehicles, including the ZiKZ 605-R, and the Khan 317 Sentinel scout vehicle.
· New addons
· New exclusive skins and cosmetics, including vehicle skins and stickers.

70050000026817.name: Worms Rumble - Armageddon Weapon Skin Pack
70050000026817.description:
Customise any of your weapons with these Legendary skins inspired by the smash-hit classic Worms Armageddon!

This pack includes:
Cheese Weapon Skin
Brimstone Weapon Skin
Forest Weapon Skin
Sports Weapon Skin
Manhattan Weapon Skin

70050000026818.name: Worms Rumble - Action All-Stars Pack
70050000026818.description:
Jump into the fight with your favourite action hero! Whether you’re bold, cunning, or wise, the Action All-Stars Pack has you covered.

This pack includes:
3 Outfits – Superhero, Wizard and Ninja (each with 3 different colour variants!)
3 Weapon Skins (Heroic, Magical and Cherry Blossom)
3 Emotes
3 Titles
3 Banners

70050000026819.name: Worms Rumble - Emote Pack
70050000026819.description:
Flex on your friends and foes alike with the Worms Rumble: Emote Pack!

This pack includes:
Tea Bag Emote
Disco Emote
Juggling Emote
Make It Rain Emote
Kick Ups Emote
Selfie Emote
Violin Emote
Goodbye! Emote

70050000026820.name: Worms Rumble - Captain & Shark Double Pack
70050000026820.description:
Just when you thought it was safe to go back in the arena… Land the Captain and Shark Double Pack today to receive new outfits, weapon skins, titles, banners and emotes to use on the battlefield in salty style!

This pack includes:
•	Captain outfit (3 colour variants)
•	Shark outfit (3 colour variants)
•	2 Emotes: Land Ahoy and Swimming
•	2 Weapon Skins: Treasure Map and Shark Infested
•	2 Banners: Ship and Shark
•	2 Titles: “Salty Seadog” and “Shark Bait”

70050000026821.name: Worms Rumble - Cats & Dogs Double Pack
70050000026821.description:
To celebrate the arrival of Team Deathmatch, we’re introducing the longest-standing rivalry in history, Cats vs Dogs!
Are you Team Cat or Team Dog?

This pack includes:
• Cat Outfit x 3
• Dog Outfit x 3
• Cat Banner
• Dog Banner
• Kitty Weapon Skin
• Bones Weapon Skin
• Nine Lives Title
• Good Boy Title
• Meow Emote
• Panting Emote

70050000026822.name: Worms Rumble - Bank Heist Double Pack
70050000026822.description:
Tool up with the Bank Heist Double Pack! Equipping you with outfits, emotes, banners and weapon skins to pull the ultimate bank job.

This pack includes:
Robber Outfit x 3 (Red Panda, Lemur & Racoon)
Henchman Outfit x 3 (White Mask, Gold Mask and Stripe Mask)
Graffiti Banner
Vault Banner
Mastermind Title
Smooth Operator Title
Taunt Emote
Finger Guns Emote
Jackpot Weapon Skin
Graffiti Weapon Skin

70050000026823.name: Worms Rumble - Honor & Death Pack
70050000026823.description:
Rekindle your hunger for battle and glory with the Honor and Death Pack.
As the forces of good and evil clash, where will you swear allegiance?

This pack includes:
• Hero Knight Outfit x 3
• Death Knight Outfit x 3
• Righteous Banner
• Corrupted Banner
• Righteous Weapon Skin
• Corrupted Weapon Skin
• King’s Champion Title
• King Slayer Title
• Sword Stance Emote
• Axe Wield Emote

70050000026858.name: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Storm Ground - Spoils of War Weapon Pack
70050000026858.description:
Expand your Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Storm Ground experience with the Spoils of War Weapon Pack and receive three new legendary weapons for each faction to enhance your armies.

The Spoils of War Weapon Pack includes:
• The Everspoil, a Maggotkin axe
• The Shatterer’s Second, a Stormcast hammer
• The Harvester of Grief, a Nighthaunt scythe

Each weapon can be equipped by the heroes of its faction.

70050000026870.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Sportscars Pack
70050000026870.description:
When speed is everything, everyone wants the fastest cars! And this amazing HOT WHEELS™ - Sportscars Pack has got you covered. It includes two racing cars where everything is oversized, just like the fun of driving them. 

The roadster version of Mad Manga™ inspired by the world of Japanese comics, Track Manga™ features huge spoilers perfect for crazy drift stunts and double rear exhaust pipes to let you hear all its power. 

Among the hottest race cars around and with a retro-vibe design, GT-Scorcher™ features a massive body and huge rear wing for stability and ground effect. Ignite its power in the heat of the race!

HOT WHEELS™ - Sportscars Pack with Track Manga™ and GT-Scorcher™ is now available for purchase.

This DLC includes 2 vehicles:
- Track Manga™ 
- GT-Scorcher™

This DLC is not included in any HOT WHEELS™ Pass

70050000026871.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Beefed Up Pack
70050000026871.description:
When the going gets tough, the tough get going… on the podium! Power up your collection with two vehicles full of strength. 

Behind its tough armored body, HW Armored Truck hides a gentle and meek heart. Yeah, right... we're kidding: this armored vehicle will show no mercy to anyone and will resist every attack to secure your victory… you can take this to the bank! 

And talkin’ about high value stud, here is Baja Bone Shaker™, a heavily modified version of the original Bone Shaker™ for when the regular track isn't enough. Anyone who thinks they can beat this solid off-road truck is... way off! With its giant wheels, it will be a tough nut to crack for any opponent. 

HOT WHEELS™ - Beefed Up Pack is now available for purchase.

This DLC includes 2 vehicles:
- HW Armored Truck 
- Baja Bone Shaker™

This DLC is not included in any HOT WHEELS™ Pass

70050000026872.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Street Beasts™ Pack
70050000026872.description:
Here is a special pack with two unstoppable Hot Wheels™ Originals! 
Let's start with the legendary Shark Bite™, a motorized shark with an unrivaled hunger for victory, ready to devour anyone who gets in its way. The competition will find itself in really treacherous waters! Nothing can stop its relentless energy; opponents can only bite the dust. Add this jaw-dropping beauty to your collection now! 

And from the king of the oceans to the king of the dunes: Tomb Up™ is ready to cast its curse on all its rivals. They'll get their just deserts. The ancient power of this mummy will lead you to pharaonic victories! Thumbs up for the special HOT WHEELS™ - Street Beasts™ Pack! 

This DLC includes 2 vehicles:
- Shark Bite™ 
- Tomb Up™

This DLC is not included in any HOT WHEELS™ Pass

70050000026944.name: Additional Character: Riho Futaba, Original Blue Swimsuit
70050000026944.description: Riho Futaba (voiced by Yuko Goto), a virtual idol who has appeared in numerous video games including the "Dream Club" series, is joining the EDF, appearing in her Original Blue Swimsuit. She also comes equipped with an exclusive weapon available only with this content.

70050000026947.name: Retrograde Arena - Supporter Pack
70050000026947.description:
Exclusive skins for our supporters. If you love the game and want to support us, you'll get Neon swag to showcase in the arena.

This DLC includes :
• 11 Exclusive Skins
• 2 Particle Effects
• 2 Fancy Thruster ($$$/¥¥¥)

70050000026948.name: Retrograde Arena - Arms Race Pack
70050000026948.intro: Arms Race DLC includes Arms Race game mode and six maps.
70050000026948.description:
Increase your level and Upgrade your weapon by eliminating enemies. Win the match by being the first player to get a kill with the last weapon. There are UNLIMITED BULLETS for all weapons You'll respawn immediately after dying and get back to the action quick. A super-duper skill game mode that requires fast thinking and reflex.

◆The DLC Includes:
1. Arms Race game mode
2. Arms Race maps:
• Cross-Bounce: A claustrophobic map with short range and long-range battles.
• Bouncy Barriers: Symmetrical map where no place is safe!
• Inner Sanctum: Small map that will force Close Quarter Shootouts.
• Asterisk Arena: Maps with a lot of shortcuts for unlimited play dynamics!
3. Arms Race converted maps:
• Prototype Arena
• X Arena

◆Extra Maps:
1. King’s Crown map:
• Museum: Arena that forces you, the player to fight close up and personal
2. Supersizer map:
• Gladiator Arena: Different weapons, different strategy each round!

◆FAQ
1. What makes this different than deathmatch?
- Unlimited bullets and you will change weapons after certain number of eliminations

2. Why do the time limit change?
- The time limit change according to the number of players in the match.

3. My friends don't own the DLC, can they join this mode?
- Anyone can join the mode as long as the game host own the Arms Race DLC

70050000026949.name: Retrograde Arena - Deathmatch Pack
70050000026949.intro: Deathmatch DLC includes Deathmatch game mode with six new maps.
70050000026949.description:
Deathmatch: You must eliminate as many other players as possible within the time limit. You'll respawn immediately after destruction for rapid tempo gameplay. A high-octane game mode that will keep you on your toes.

◆This DLC Includes:
1. Deathmatch game mode

2. Deathmatch maps:
• Rooms: Classic maps retooled for Deathmatches
• Cross-Bounce: a claustrophobic map with short range and long-range battles.
• Bouncy Barriers: Symmetrical map where no place is safe!
• Mirror Mirror: A map with mirrors encircling the perimeter, all bullets will always bounce on perimeter!

3. Deathmatch converted maps:
• Prototype Arena
• Barriers on Demand

◆ Extra Maps
King’s Crown map: Find and chase the crown through narrow passages
Supersizer map: Cages: A map separated by mirrors forcing everyone to get up close and personal with the shotgun

◆FAQ
1. Is this a team deathmatch?
- No, it isn't. This is a free-for -all deathmatch

2. Why does the deathmatch time limit change?
- The time limit change according to the number of players in the match.

3. My friends don't own the DLC, can they join this mode?
- Anyone can join the mode as long as the game’s host owns the Deathmatch Pack DLC

70050000027006.name: Knockout City™ Standard Edition
70050000027006.intro: Throw, catch, pass, dodge, and tackle your way to glory!
70050000027006.description:
Team up and duke it out with rival Crews in Knockout City*, where you settle the score with EPIC DODGEBALL BATTLES. Brace yourself for outrageous fun and intense competition in an all-new take on team-based multiplayer games. 

Customize your character and form a Crew with friends to start your Knockout City takeover. Knock out opponents with trick shots and coordinated teamwork while dodging and catching balls flying across the map. No ball? No problem! You can literally ball up, roll into a teammate’s hands, and become the ultimate weapon! 

A variety of outlandish ball types, locations, and game modes keep it exciting. Plus, each season introduces new maps, ball types, rewards, events, and challenges! Throw, catch, pass, dodge, and tackle your way to dodgeball dominance!

KEY FEATURES:
•  Frantic and Fun — Rule the city through lightning-fast multiplayer matches featuring mind-blowing dodgeball mechanics. Increase your attack by passing to power up dodgeballs, targeting your opponents with a variety of specialized balls, or “balling up” at any time to get thrown by teammates! 

•  Crew Up — Assemble an All-Star dodgeball Crew with your friends for multiplayer matches in a seamless cross-play experience! Together, knock out opponents in 3v3, 4v4, or free-for-all matches. Pass, throw, and strategize to dominate as a team and unlock distinctive, Crew-only rewards! 

•  Define Your Style — Show off your status and unique look through character and Crew designs with expansive character creation options. Customize your appearance, gear, and attitude, from body type and hairstyle to a custom glider and Crew vehicle to win, lose, and taunt animations. 

•  Take On Knockout City — Battle it out with other Crews across dynamic maps all over the city. Each map’s special features make every match an intense, unexpected experience. Dodgeball thrives in back alleys with pneumatic tubes, on skyscraper rooftops, across busy streets—and even at the local burger joint and construction sites. While you’re dodging dodgeballs, watch out for moving cars, rooftop drops, and even a wrecking ball or two. 

•  Strikingly Fresh Yet Familiar — It’s easy to pick up and play thanks to familiar controls, but practice is key to becoming a champion. On a level playing field, only the most skilled ballers stand out from the crowd. Use your knowledge to master the intricacies of the game for spectacular KOs.

70050000027033.name: Knockout City™ Deluxe Upgrade
70050000027033.intro: Take your game from basic to Epic with the Deluxe Upgrade!
70050000027033.description:
Take your game from basic to Epic and achieve dodgeball dominance in style with the Knockout City™ Deluxe Upgrade*! The Deluxe Upgrade includes: 

•  1 exclusive Epic outfit
•  1 exclusive Epic Crew vehicle
•  3 exclusive Epic Crew logos
•  3 exclusive Epic Crew banners
•  1,000 Holobux**

70050000027073.name: Additional Art & Music from the Vaults
70050000027073.intro: Enjoy an additional 25 pieces of art and 29 music tracks with comments from the creators.
70050000027073.description:
Early purchasers will also receive the "From the Vault" bonus content, featuring an additional 25 pieces of art and 29 music tracks that you can enjoy at any time from within the game.

Each amazing piece includes a unique comment by its creator, giving you even more insight into the world of The Great Ace Attorney.

*This bonus may be sold separately in the future.
*You must purchase the main game on or before August 31, 2021 to receive this bonus.

70050000027110.name: Additional Character: Riho Futaba, Classic Hostess Costume
70050000027110.description: Riho Futaba (voiced by Yuko Goto), a virtual idol who has appeared in numerous video games including the "Dream Club" series, is now joining the EDF as a playable character. With her Classic Hostess Costume, she also comes equipped with a pure heart.

70050000027111.name: Additional Character: Riho Futaba, Cool Summer Outfit
70050000027111.description: Riho Futaba (voiced by Yuko Goto), a virtual idol who has appeared in numerous video games including the "Dream Club" series, is now joining the EDF as a playable character. Her Cool Summer Outfit allows her to stay cool while defending the Earth, no matter how intense the battle gets.

70050000027112.name: Additional Character: Riho Futaba, Merry Santa Costume
70050000027112.description: Riho Futaba (voiced by Yuko Goto), a virtual idol who has appeared in numerous video games including the "Dream Club" series, is now joining the EDF. And what's more, she's appearing in her Deluxe Edition early purchase limited edition Santa Costume. She also comes equipped with an exclusive weapon available only with this content.

70050000027113.name: Ranger (EDF5), Sergeant Colors & Special Gear
70050000027113.description: The "Sergeant" is the reliable leader who allowed the protagonist of "Earth Defense Force 5" to reach his full potential. This allows you to play as an EDF5 Ranger that uses the Sergeant's colors. Furthermore, he comes equipped with a certain weapon that comes to mind when you think of the Sergeant. Now you can lead both your team and the planet to safety as if you were the Sergeant himself. Just be aware that the actual Sergeant character does not appear in the game.

70050000027114.name: Fencer (EDF5), Grim Reaper Colors & Special Gear
70050000027114.description: The Grim Reapers were the elite fencers that appeared in "Earth Defense Force 5." They were a dependable force that often aided (and at times were aided by) the protagonist. This allows you to play as an EDF5 Fencer that uses the Grim Reaper's colors. He of course comes equipped with a Blasthole Spear for his weapon. Now, charge into the enemy as if staring death straight in the eyes.

70050000027115.name: Wing Diver (EDF5), Spriggan Colors & Special Gear
70050000027115.description: The Spriggans were the elite wing divers that appeared in "Earth Defense Force 5." They are a group of flying Amazons who often joined the protagonist's missions. Along with the Grim Reapers, the Spriggans, and their strong-minded and confident leader, are popular NPCs. This allows you to play as an EDF5 Wing Diver that uses these sassy sisters' colors. She of course comes equipped with a Mag Blaster for her weapon. Now, head to the battle as an Amazon to teach those aliens to fear the EDF.

70050000027116.name: Ranger (EDF4), Omega Team Colors & Special Gear
70050000027116.description: The Omega Team is a group of elite rangers who appeared in the world of "Earth Defense Force 2025" and "Earth Defense Force 4.1: The Shadow of New Despair," known for their flashy colors and high-output lasers. They are stalwart NPCs whose weapons sometimes outpower the EDF4 protagonist. This allows you to play as an EDF4 Ranger using the Omega Team colors. And for his weapon? Well, that goes without saying. Now, let the enemies enjoy the sweet taste of laser.

70050000027117.name: Prowl Rider (EDF: IR), KR Prototype & Special Gear
70050000027117.description: In the world of "Earth Defense Force: Iron Rain," the Kindred Rebellion ceded from the EDF and developed their own experimental Prowl Rider PA-Gear. While the EDF's Prowl Rider technology took the lead and the Rebellion's version of the gear came to be known as a "prototype," its specs are comparable to the EDF's official gear. This allows you to use the Kindred Rebellion's version of the Prowl Rider, equipped with a special weapon. Now, go and prove that the Rebellion's technology is a force to be reckoned with.

70050000027118.name: Infantry (EDF3), Storm 1 Colors & Special Gear
70050000027118.description: This allows you to play as an EDF3 Infantry using the colors of Storm 1, the legendary soldier who was the protagonist of "Earth Defense Force 2017" and "Earth Defense Force 2017 Portable," equipped with a special weapon. Those who enlisted early can use this to fight while feeling like a legend. Now, go and save our Earth!

70050000027119.name: The Legendary Mr. Y, Reborn as "Mecha Yuki" After His Acid Incident!?
70050000027119.description:
This allows you to use a special character and that character's weapon.

There was once a soldier who defended the Earth valiantly against the Invaders until he was defeated. Half of his body was covered in lethal acid before he spoke his final word. Who was this word meant for? His family? A friend? Or perhaps, a lover? No...he must have been speaking to the soldiers entrusted with the fate of the Earth. But this was in another world, on a round planet. In this square Earth, he has returned to the battlefield, the majority of his body now mechanized using the latest technology. And in his hand? An Acid Gun...

70050000027120.name: Hostess Setsu from Dream Club, Giving the EDF a Try!?
70050000027120.description:
This allows you to use a special character and that character's weapon.

This hostess was chosen to join the fight from "Dream Club," a club for adults that can only be joined by those with a pure heart. The rambunctious Setsu (or "Setsu-Chan") is known as the "fierce tiger" of Dream Club. She boiled with rage on hearing the planet is in trouble, and jumped at the opportunity to help. For her Ability, she sets up a bear-shaped power spot which further amplifies her fighting spirit. For her SP Move, she freezes the enemies by making a brisk snow fall from above. Her unlikely weapon is a portable railgun that needs to be charged to fire. Though it may not seem so at first, this is truly pure power to the extreme.

70050000027121.name: Hostess Mian from Dream Club, Giving the EDF a Try!?
70050000027121.description:
This allows you to use a special character and that character's weapon.

This hostess was chosen to join the fight from "Dream Club," a club for adults that can only be joined by those with a pure heart. The most aloof hostess at Dream Club, Mian appears to have reluctantly agreed to help defend the Earth. Always depending on others, for her Ability she sets down an automated laser turret, and for her SP Move she requests an explosive shooting star attack. For her weapon, she uses a devastating laser cannon that appeared in the EDF: IR world. The longer you fire it, the stronger it gets, and at maximum output it can deliver some ruinous results. Now, THIS is pure power.

70050000027122.name: Hostess ILI from Dream Club, Giving the EDF a Try!?
70050000027122.description:
This allows you to use a special character and that character's weapon.

This hostess was chosen to join the fight from "Dream Club," a club for adults that can only be joined by those with a pure heart. ILI, an autonomous android who for some reason works at Dream Club, apparently wants to prove her true potential by saving the Earth. Despite being an android, performance-wise she is comparable to a human. With her innocent heart (AI?), she would never shoot beams from her eyes, or do anything of that sort. But hoping to find batteries, she was coaxed into joining the EDF and modded into a tool of destruction: for her Ability she can float in midair, and for her SP Move she causes javelins to rain from the sky. Although she really only needs manganese batteries to function, for her weapon she's been equipped with a massive automatic shotgun paired with a reflector shield. Now, THIS is pure power.

70050000027123.name: Aya, the Calm Big Sister Swordswoman from "OneeChanbara"
70050000027123.description:
This allows you to use a special character and that character's weapon.

Aya, the calm and composed swordswoman from the zombie-infested world of "OneeChanbara," has joined the fight, wearing not only her trademark 10-gallon hat and bikini, but also with a katana as her weapon. Usually focused on exterminating zombies, she has decided to break from her normal routine and use her sword-wielding expertise to help save the Earth. She may appear less "herself" here compared to her appearance in the "round" world, but that's to be expected in a world without curves. For her SP Move, she unleashes her powerful "Xtasy Combination," which feels as good as the name suggests when it hits.

70050000027124.name: Saki, the Crazed Little Sister Swordswoman from "OneeChanbara"
70050000027124.description:
This allows you to use a special character and that character's weapon.

Saki, the crazed swordswoman from the zombie-infested world of "OneeChanbara," is here and ready to fight using her super long katana and acrobatics. Like her big sister Aya, she usually spends her time exterminating zombies, but she couldn't sit idly by while the Earth was in pieces. She may appear less "herself" here compared to her appearance in the "round" world, but that's to be expected in a world without curves. For her SP Move, she uses her family's Baneful blood to temporarily boost her attack power and become invincible. Now, THIS is truly Baneful power.

70050000027125.name: Colonist: "We'll Help, If It Means Saving the Planet"!?
70050000027125.description:
This allows you to use a special character and that character's weapon.

The Colonists who invaded the planet in "Earth Defense Force 5" have rushed to join the fight. Why would a previous enemy join the EDF in defending the Earth? The answer to that question will be clear when you reach the end of this game, so we wouldn't want to put any spoilers here. Let's just say that yesterday's foes are today's friends. And they look just like us humans! (Ribbit.) Anyway, let's put aside our differences for now and fight together!

70050000027126.name: Cosmonaut: "We'll Take the Planet As Is"!
70050000027126.description:
This allows you to use a special character and that character's weapon.

The Cosmonauts who had invaded the planet in "Earth Defense Force 5" have rushed to join the fight. Why would a previous enemy join the EDF in defending the Earth? The answer to that question will be clear when you reach the end of this game, so we wouldn't want to put any spoilers here. Let's just say that yesterday's foes are today's friends. They don't bear the slightest resemblance to us humans, but there's nothing more beautiful than mutual understanding. Isn't it heartwarming when former enemies join forces to defeat a shared threat?

70050000027127.name: Additional Mission Pack: Another ResCUBE
70050000027127.description:
This is an additional mission pack featuring new enemies that do not appear in the base game.

Contains over 10 advanced missions designed for elite soldiers. That long-awaited creepy-crawly enemy that EDF enlistees were waiting for is finally here. These missions are pretty tough, so be sure you've built enough confidence and have completed missions in the base game on a high difficulty level before attempting. Also contains new weapons.

-Another ResCUBE: Prologue-

In 2020, Dark Tyrant and 6 Motherships began an attack on the Earth.

The Motherships all attacked at once, and tore the planet into pieces.

After an intense battle, the Brothers & Sisters, led by the Commander, successfully defeated Dark Tyrant.

The planet was restored, but the EDF's work was not done yet. They continued battling the invading forces in each of their native lands.

But then... 

Something happened.

In 2021, another disaster occurred. A distress call was received from the UK. Many never-before-seen enemies emerged.

And once again, the planet was torn apart...

70050000027132.name: Collector's Set of Various Character Versions
70050000027132.description:
This allows you to use a special character and that character's weapon below:
①Ranger (EDF5), Sergeant Colors & Special Gear Ver.1.01
②Fencer (EDF5), Grim Reaper Colors & Special Gear Ver.1.01
③Wing Diver (EDF5), Spriggan Colors & Special Gear Ver.1.01
④Ranger (EDF4), Omega Team Colors & Special Gear Ver.1.01
⑤Prowl Rider (EDF: IR), KR Prototype & Special Gear Ver.1.01

70050000027183.name: Golden Banana Mode
70050000027183.description: Roll through the all-new Golden Banana Mode as you race against time to collect all the bananas!

70050000027203.name: 【Ryza 1 Million Units Celebration】 High Summer Formal
70050000027203.intro: A chic little black dress for Ryza!
70050000027203.description:
“High Summer Formal” is a new special costume for Ryza.

It commemorates the fact that “Atelier Ryza: Ever Darkness & the Secret Hideout” and “Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends & the Secret Fairy” have exceeded one million units sold worldwide.

Costumes can be changed by selecting "Changing Room" from the diary found on the desk in Ryza's atelier.
Note: For more details please visit the official website: https://www.koeitecmoamerica.com/ryza2/

70050000027222.name: SnowRunner - Anniversary DLC
70050000027222.description:
Celebrate SnowRunner’s first anniversary with the Anniversary DLC and receive two new trucks for free! The CAT 681 and International HX 520 give you all new options for adventuring across the harsh landscapes of SnowRunner, and look good doing it.

The CAT 681 is a robust, all-terrain heavyweight with plenty of storage space and the power to make it across even the harshest of maps. With a sturdy construction it’s less prone to breakage than other trucks.

The International HX 520 can attach to any number of large trailers and is perfect for hauling cargo across the most intense terrain. It joins a fleet of more than 40 others in giving you every option for conquering the wilderness.

70050000027225.name: SnowRunner - Tatra Dual Pack
70050000027225.description:
Expand and bring even more versatility to your SnowRunner fleet with the TATRA Dual Pack, giving you access to the iconic TATRA 813 and TATRA 805!

The TATRA Dual Pack is included for all Year 2 Pass owners.

70050000027228.name: SnowRunner - Season 5: Build & Dispatch
70050000027228.description: Expand your SnowRunner experience with this new DLC.

70050000027231.name: SnowRunner - Season 6: Haul & Hustle
70050000027231.description: Expand your SnowRunner experience with this new DLC.

70050000027234.name: SnowRunner - Season 7: Compete & Conquer
70050000027234.description: Expand your SnowRunner experience with this new DLC.

70050000027237.name: SnowRunner - Season 8: New Expansion
70050000027237.description: Expand your SnowRunner experience with this new DLC.

70050000027240.name: SnowRunner - GMC Brigadier
70050000027240.description:
Expand your SnowRunner garage further with the GMC Brigadier DLC, bringing you the brawny GMC Brigadier as well as an exclusive alternate skin. This gas-guzzling juggernaut, upgradable with all-wheel drive and differential lock, will provide extraordinary power and torque to your most daunting missions! 

The GMC Brigadier DLC is not included in the Year 1 Pass or Year 2 Pass.

70050000027243.name: SnowRunner - Burning Bright Vinyl Wrap Pack
70050000027243.description:
Customize your SnowRunner experience further with the Burning Bright Vinyl Wrap Pack, adding four exclusive skins for the Azov 5319, Azov 73210, YAR 87 and Voron AE-4380! 

The Burning Bright Vinyl Wrap Pack is included for all Year 2 Pass owners.

70050000027250.name: Capcom Arcade Stadium: Display Frames Set 1
70050000027250.description: A set of wallpapers for use in-game, modeled after the designs and artwork of the titles included in Capcom Arcade Stadium.

70050000027255.name: Capcom Arcade Stadium: Invincibility
70050000027255.description:
Unlocks the Invincibility feature, which allows you to play any of the included games with invincibility on.

Note: While the user can't take any damage when using the Invincibility feature, depending on the game specifications it's still possible to die in-game.

70050000027326.name: Disgaea 6 Starter Support Set
70050000027326.description:
A free set of items that come in handy at the start of the game.
- 10,000 HL
- 500 Mana
- Mint Gum x5
- Unopened Soda x5
- Slippers x3
- 2x Boost Ticket x1

70050000027329.name: Worms Rumble - Spaceworm and Alien Double Pack
70050000027329.description:
Worms in Spaaaaaace! Kit out your Worm with outfits, banners, emotes, weapon skins and titles that are out of this world!

The Spaceworm and Alien Double Pack Includes:
• 6 Outfits (Pioneer Outfit, Voyager Outfit, Apollo Outfit, Grey Alien Outfit, Green Alien Outfit, Pink Alien Outfit)
• 2 Banners (Invasion Banner and Rocket Banner)
• 2 Emotes (Salute Emote and Come In Peace Emote)
• 2 Weapon Skins (Neon Invader Weapon Skin and Golden Space Weapon Skin)
• 2 Titles (Invader and Explorer)

70050000027333.name: Disgaea 6 Innocent Equipment Set
70050000027333.description:
A set of equipment that have Innocents that will certainly give you the upper hand in battle!

Contains Innocents that increase the amount of HL, Mana, and EXP you gain from battle, and ones that increase the amount of critical hit damage.

70050000027334.name: Disgaea 6 Hololive Collaboration Set
70050000027334.description: A set of unique characters with special colors, voices, and equipment.

70050000027335.name: Disgaea 6 Character: Mao
70050000027335.description: Adds Mao from Disgaea 3: Absence of Justice to join your party!

70050000027336.name: Disgaea 6 Character: Raspberyl
70050000027336.description: Adds Raspberyl from Disgaea 3: Absence of Justice to join your party!

70050000027337.name: Disgaea 6 Zed and Bieko Color & Equipment Set
70050000027337.description: Special character colors and equipment for Zed and Bieko.

70050000027338.name: Disgaea 6 Melodia Color & Equipment Set
70050000027338.description: A special character color and equipment for Melodia.

70050000027339.name: Disgaea 6 Majolene Color & Equipment Set
70050000027339.description: A special character color and equipment for Majolene.

70050000027340.name: Disgaea 6 Misedor Color & Equipment Set
70050000027340.description: A special character color and equipment for Misedor.

70050000027341.name: Disgaea 6 Piyori Color & Equipment Set
70050000027341.description: A special character color and equipment for Piyori.

70050000027342.name: Disgaea 6 Ivar Color & Equipment Set
70050000027342.description: A special character color and equipment for Ivar.

70050000027343.name: Disgaea 6 Laharl, Etna, and Flonne Color & Equipment Set
70050000027343.description: Special character colors and equipment for Laharl, Etna, and Flonne.

70050000027344.name: Disgaea 6 Character: Valvatorez
70050000027344.description: Adds Valvatorez from Disgaea 4: A Promise Unforgotten to join your party!

70050000027345.name: Disgaea 6 Character: Pleinair
70050000027345.description: Adds Pleinair to join your party!

70050000027350.name: King's Bounty II - Day One Edition Pack
70050000027350.description:
Hounds of War Warhorse:
A unique creature, your best friend… and a real horror for your enemies.

Elite Guard premium pack:
Unlock special skins for your army!

Flaming Eagles: 
This unique a red-hot living creature using his claws, beak, and special skills.

Firehand Golems:
Firehand Golems is an experimental version of the Sentry Golem with flamethrowers.

Armored Princess’s Shield: 
This shield once protected a legendary warrior from another world...

70050000027351.name: King's Bounty II - Lord's Edition Upgrade
70050000027351.description:
Upgrade to the Lord's Edition bolsters your epic adventure into a fantasy world of Antara with digital DLCs.

The King's Bounty II Lord's Edition includes the following content:

• Rod of Deception 
• Frosthammer 
• Staff of Harmony 
• Tyrant's Sword 
• Armor of the Hollow
• Heroes & Villains Premium Pack
• King‘s Watchdogs

70050000027356.name: Disgaea 6 Character: Fuka
70050000027356.description: Adds Fuka from Disgaea 4: A Promise Unforgotten to join your party!

70050000027357.name: Disgaea 6 Character: Desco
70050000027357.description: Adds Desco from Disgaea 4: A Promise Unforgotten to join your party!

70050000027358.name: Disgaea 6 Character: Killia
70050000027358.description: Adds Killia from Disgaea 5: Alliance of Vengeance to join your party!

70050000027359.name: Disgaea 6 Character: Usalia
70050000027359.description: Adds Usalia from Disgaea 5: Alliance of Vengeance to join your party!

70050000027444.name: The Thrice Damned 1: Isle of the Dead
70050000027444.description:
A fortified pirate settlement in an uncharted region of the Mediterranean? Reports of murderous monsters roaming a remote jungle paradise? All in a day's work for the Strange Brigade!

Welcome, adventurers, to the Isle of the Dead, the first mission in a thrilling new three-part Strange Brigade campaign: The Thrice Damned!
Seteki may have been defeated, but there’s no rest for the wicked, not even for a spot of tea! Expand your Strange Brigade adventure with this new story mission, explore a spooky island solo or in 2-4 player co-op and send legions of evil skeletons back to the sand from whence they came!

70050000027453.name: The Thrice Damned 2: The Sunken Kingdom
70050000027453.description:
A mythical underground city with a tremendously tantalising temple at its very centre? Deadly cave-dwelling nasties hiding around every corner waiting to pounce? Just another Tuesday for the Strange Brigade!

Mind your head adventurer, The Sunken Kingdom is the second brand new mission in The Thrice Damned campaign. 

You might have liberated the first Shield of Bes fragment from those fiendish foes, but there's still work to be done! Continue the story with this thrilling new mission and blast your way through a captivatingly colossal city solo or in 2-4 player co-op!

70050000027454.name: The Thrice Damned 3: Great Pyramid of Bes
70050000027454.description:
A perilous pyramid full of terrifying traps? A troublesome teleporter to the afterlife? Old foes seeking revenge? Sounds like the climax to this terrifying tale will be anything but a walk in the park for our heroes!

Grab a stiff drink, adventurer, the Great Pyramid of Bes is the thrilling finale to the Thrice Damned campaign.

The legendary Shield of Bes may be complete and hordes of foes in the ground once more, but there's still work to be done!

Finish the tantalising tale in this epic conclusion and blast your way to the finale solo or in 2-4 player co-op!

70050000027455.name: Dashing Outfits Pack
70050000027455.description:
Make sure you’re wearing your Sunday best, even when fighting off hordes of the undead!

Look the bee’s knees with the Dashing Outfits Pack, available exclusively with the Digital Deluxe Edition! Including swanky new outfits for Frank, Gracie, Nalangu, and Archimedes, this pack is ideal for the budding adventurer looking to stand out from the crowd while sending mummies back to the underworld.

70050000027456.name: Secret Service Weapons Pack
70050000027456.description:
Face down fantastic foes with this peerless package of top-notch firepower designed for Strange Brigade agents in the field! With three new firearms perfectly balanced for the discerning adventurer, the Secret Service Weapons Pack includes:

WILKERS & WHITE P19 (Pistol)
Love to shoot the supernatural? Hate wasting ammo? You’re in luck! With its butter-smooth handling the P19 pistol takes accuracy to new heights.

STOUDENMIRE 960 (Submachine gun)
The Stoudenmire may not be the heaviest of fellows, but when it fires over 900 rounds per minute with alarming accuracy, it'll do far more than just bruise a beasty!

GEHRI-DELGANE S1 (Rifle)
This one-of-a-kind collaboration from Gehrig and Delgane packs a punch like no-other, but takes nerves of steel, or a damn fine schnapps, to master its brutish strength!

70050000027457.name: Maharani Huntress Character Expansion Pack
70050000027457.description:
Grab your gear, a new Strange Brigade member has joined the hunt: Anjali Khan, tracker extraordinaire!

The secret Maharani ruler of a prosperous Indian state, it was only after the discovery of an unholy curse on her family that Anjali joined up with the Strange Brigade in the hopes of tracking down and defeating the demon that afflicted it once and for all. 

The Maharani Huntress character expansion pack includes playable character Anjali Khan and the following:

- Spear of the Ice age amulet power
- Audley A40 Exemplar SMG
- Eastleigh M1 rifle
- Cluster Grenade special item

All contents of this pack can be used in any mode, solo or in online co-op.

70050000027458.name: Japanese Naval Officer Character Expansion Pack
70050000027458.description:
All hands on deck, a new Strange Brigade member has joined the crew: Hachiro Shimizu, master survivalist! 

Once part of a secret mission to explore a remote Pacific Island, Shimizu and his crew found themselves shipwrecked and victim to the island's monstrous miscreants. Shimizu alone survived long enough to be rescued by the Strange Brigade, and has been with them ever since. 

The Japanese Naval Officer character expansion pack includes playable character Hachiro Shimizu and the following: 

- Decaying Demon Blast amulet power
- Mikhailov-38 rifle
- Marchador TT pistol
- Shock Grenade special item

All contents of this pack can be used in any mode, solo or in online co-op.

70050000027459.name: American Aviatrix Character Expansion Pack
70050000027459.description:
A brand new Strange Brigade agent swoops in with a new amulet power and new weapons. Introducing: Tessie Caldwell, rebel of the skies!
A former stunt-pilot, Tessie’s fearlessness caught the eye of the Strange Brigade and now she thrill seeks all over the world, bathing the undead in a hail of fire, ice and bullets from her iconic 1930s firearms.

The American Aviatrix character expansion pack includes playable character Tessie Caldwell and the following:
-	Infernal Firestorm amulet power
-	Hyde & Sons Compact pistol
-	Colbeck Wildfire submachine gun
-	Glacier Bomb special item

All contents of this pack can be used in any mode, either solo and in online co-op.

70050000027460.name: Texas Cowboy Character Pack
70050000027460.description:
Play as Patrick "Bash" Conaghan, a rootin'-tootin' gunslinging addition to the Strange Brigade!

A rough-around-the-edges brawler and adventurer, "Bash" is happy to go wherever there's danger and treasure to be found. Along with brand new amulet power, his master gunslinger skills bless him with hefty headshots and fast recharging explosives!

70050000027461.name: Gentleman Explorer Character Pack
70050000027461.description:
Play as Winston Bey, a dapper new addition to the Strange Brigade!

Explorer, prospector, journalist, spy, diplomat, gentleman traveller ... Winston Bey's adventures have taken him all over the world! An adept addition to the team, his extensive travels have blessed him with a tougher-than-average constitution and a wider radius for soul gathering.

70050000027474.name: Classic Character Pack
70050000027474.description: Kick it old school with character skins based on the original Super Monkey Ball game. This pack includes character skins for AiAi, MeeMee, Baby, GonGon, YanYan and Doctor.

70050000027475.name: SEGA Legends Pack
70050000027475.description: Play as the iconic SEGA Consoles. This pack includes SEGA Dreamcast, SEGA Saturn, and SEGA Game Gear.

70050000027476.name: Customization Pack
70050000027476.description: Customize your character with 10 items: two hats, four shirts, two pairs of sneakers and two skins for your Super Monkey ball!

70050000027477.name: Classic Soundtrack
70050000027477.description: Rock out like its 2001 with music tracks form the original Super Monkey Ball game.

70050000027478.name: Bonus Cosmetic Pack
70050000027478.description: Customize your character with 10 items:  four hats, four shirts, and two skins for your Super Monkey ball!

70050000027683.name: Character Edit Ticket One-Pack
70050000027683.description:
Character Edit Vouchers allow you to the appearance of your character once per voucher. Use a from the chest in Your House to edit your appearance. Please note that the name of your character cannot be changed.

This add-on contains:

● Character Edit Ticket (1)

Note: After purchasing, restart the game to receive add-on content. This add-on content can only be obtained once. Each ticket is consumed upon saving the edited character. You can edit hair, makeup and armour colour from chest in Your House without using a ticket.

70050000027785.name: UNO® 50th Anniversary DLC
70050000027785.description:
It's time to celebrate the golden anniversary of the popular card game with UNO® 50th Anniversary DLC! We've put on our black-tie best for such an occasion. Featuring all the fast-paced fun and unpredictable twists you love and based on the stunning physical edition of the game. It's time to celebrate in style! 

Main Features: 
- Gorgeous, velvety black cards to dress your cards in the very best
- The exclusive 50/50 card and an elegant, special gold coin. Toss the coin to decide who has to draw four extra cards!

Will YOU be the first to clear your hand and claim victory?

70050000027831.description:

Enjoy a new and unique costume that gives a fresh look to every battlefield!

■Content

■How to use
Costumes can be changed by selecting "Change Costume" at the "Select Character" screen of "Musou Mode" or "Citadel Mode".

Note: This is a bonus product.
Available from June 24th, 2021 to July 26th, 2021.

70050000027841.name: Season Pass Bonus
70050000027841.description:
■Content
30,000 "Stock EXP"
100,000 "Stock Weapon Mastery"
300 "Skill Points"

■How to use
Stock EXP: Stock EXP can be used to upgrade officers at My Castle in "Musou Mode" or "Citadel Mode" by selecting "Dojo" - "Officer Training" - "Training".

Stock Weapon Mastery: Stock Weapon Mastery can be used to upgrade weapons at My Castle in "Musou Mode" or "Citadel Mode" by selecting "Dojo" - "Officer Training" - "Increase Weapon Mastery".

Skill Points: Skill Points can be used to upgrade officers at My Castle in "Musou Mode" or "Citadel Mode" by selecting "Dojo" - "Officer Training" - "Acquiring Skills".

70050000027842.name: Digital Deluxe Edition Bonus
70050000027842.description:
■Content
Special Blade Rift Blade
Special Katana Masterpiece
Special Spear Sharpened Fang Spear
Special Bow Sky Piercer
Special Horse
Special Skill Gem Set
Items

■How to use
Special Blade, Special Katana, Special Spear, Special Bow, Special Horse: Equipable at My Castle in "Musou Mode" or "Citadel Mode" by selecting "Dojo" - "Change Equipment".

Special Skill Gems: Gems can be used to upgrade weapons at My Castle in "Musou Mode" or "Citadel Mode" by selecting "Blacksmith" - "Craft Weapon".

The following additional content is included:

Additional Scenario & BGM Set 1 "Oichi's Getting Hitched"

■Scenario overview
Oichi is feeling troubled before her wedding to Nagamasa Azai. Just what kind of "training" has she started with Mitsuki?

■How to use the scenario
In "Musou Mode", select "March" - "DLC" from My Castle.

■How to use the BGM
After clearing the scenario, you can listen to the BGM from "Vault" - "Music Theater", or you can set the BGM as the battle music at "Preparing for Battle" by selecting "Settings" - "Change Music".

Note: Additional scenarios become playable midway through Nobunaga's Path Chapter 1.

70050000028156.name: VasterClaws 3 Special Pack
70050000028156.intro: Defeat the God-devouring Dragon in this deceptively simple squad building game!
70050000028156.description:
[Vaster Crows 3-Special Pack-]
- After clearing the first time, you can play the following world (20 hours to several hundred hours).
-After clearing the first time, increase ForceXP gained during kill (about 1.5 times).
-You can choose "individual battle" in the arena.
-Growth level is displayed in the soldier's "Battle Results".
-You can get special items after clearing the first time.
-Types of soldier markers + 4 types, etc.

70050000028165.name: Game of Crone
70050000028165.description:
You’ll have to help the escaped prisoners of the Inquisition survive in the wilderness by providing them with everything they need. To develop their camp to a fortified settlement while keeping in mind its benefits. To protect those who entrusted you with their lives, from the sword and fire. And also - to untangle the circumstances of the cruel game, which turned into the Great Blast and the return of the Ancient Curse.
• 6-12 hours of extra gameplay
• Build your own refugee camp
• Stop a vampire terrorizing the Village
• Help Donkey lead the Revolution
• Unravel the secrets of your friends
• Get access to brand new bag mechanics
• New dishes, gravestones, fences
• New teleportation scrolls

70050000028299.name: "Floral Mask" Hunter layered armor piece
70050000028299.description:
Hunt in style with this special layered armor!

After purchasing, speak to the Courier and select Add-on Content to receive the content. You will then be able to use it in the Layered Armor Settings menu of the Item Box.

Note: This item is cosmetic only and does not confer any status benefits.

70050000028300.name: "Floral Yukata" Hunter layered armor piece

70050000028372.name: Stella
70050000028372.intro: The first DLC world for hexceed, unlocking the exciting new world: Stella! Enjoy a new world filled with new puzzles to complete!
70050000028372.description:
The first DLC world for hexceed, unlocking the exciting new world: Stella!

Enjoy a new world filled with new puzzles to complete!

With 110 new levels to complete, and thousands of hexes to solve, this world promises to bring you hours of relaxing puzzle solving!

70050000028374.name: Animo
70050000028374.intro: Unlocks a new world for hexceed: Amino brings 122 new puzzles with a brand new mechanic to shake things up!
70050000028374.description:
This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Animo! 
Puzzle your way through 122 brand new levels - each with an exciting new mechanic!

Introducing the Rotating Tile mechanic!
This DLC brings with it tutorial levels for various applications of the Rotating Tile as it can be used with walls, red arrows and blue arrows!

70050000028375.name: Iter
70050000028375.intro: The third addition to hexceed, bringing 160 exciting new levels! This world includes the Rotating Tile mechanic that was introduced in the previous world, Animo!
70050000028375.description:

The third addition to hexceed, bringing 160 exciting new levels!

70050000028587.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Bone Shaker™ Unleashed Edition
70050000028587.description:
Among the most famous and desired Hot Wheels™ Originals, this Rat Rod really boasts a design bad-to-the-bone. Literally. And now even more so with its new exclusive HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED™ livery. Even if it cannot flex its "muscles" (for obvious reasons), Bone Shaker™ has what it takes to defeat the most formidable opponents... it makes no bones about it!

Inflame the race with its quadruple side pipes and let its legendary chrome skull be a recurring nightmare in everyone’s rear-view mirror.
Even in the toughest race, the speed of Bone Shaker™ is always dead on target.
Add it to your collection now!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

70050000028592.name: Arcaea x Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! Collaboration Pack
70050000028592.description:
Eight stunning songs await you in Arcaea's collaboration with Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!!

Join Hikari as Seine, Yume, and Linka arrive in a forgotten world with a celebration in tow!

This is DLC for the base game Arcaea. No progression in the base game is required beforehand—you will have access to several songs from this DLC right away, and be able to unlock others as soon as you like! In addition, all content is permanent once purchased.

Songs included in this pack:
- "MERLIN" by REDALiCE
- "OMAKENO Stroke" by t+pazolite
- "DX超性能フルメタル少女" (DX Choseinou Full Metal Shojo) by IOSYS TRAX (uno with.ちよこ)
- "Scarlet Lance" by MASAKI (ZUNTATA)
- "ouroboros -twin stroke of the end-" by Cranky VS MASAKI
- "Got hive of Ra" by E.G.G.
- "BUCHiGiRE Berserker" by REDALiCE vs MASAKI
- ???? (An all-new secret song!)

Partners included in this pack:
- Hikari & Seine
- Yume (voice included)
- Linka (voice included)

70050000028602.name: Experience x3 - Alphadia Genesis 2
70050000028602.description:
All characters' experience gained increases by 200%.
Effect stacks for similar items.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000028603.name: Damage x2 - Alphadia Genesis 2
70050000028603.description:
Damage dealt to enemies is doubled.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000028604.name: Full Restore - Alphadia Genesis 2
70050000028604.description:
All characters' HP/EP/Boost Slots are fully recovered after battle.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000028622.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Street Fighter M. Bison
70050000028622.description:
Get ready to dominate the race with the car of the most ruthless megalomaniac boss straight from the Street Fighter universe. Red like his signature military uniform, with the famous winged skull on the visor cap and his black cape, this massive truck doesn't just faithfully copy Bison's look, it also embodies his thirst for victory. 

A full power and oversized pick-up, perfect for your oversized ego! With his ghastly white eyes, M. Bison has zero tolerance for failure, so show off your special moves and hit your opponents mercilessly, like a boss! For them... it's already GAME OVER!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

70050000028623.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Superman
70050000028623.description:
Flexing its muscles all the way to the finish line, you can count on the otherworldly Superman car for the win! Like the hero who inspired it, it's the embodiment of strength and power, and its aerodynamic line is really designed to make you fly on the track! 

You don't even have to take off its glasses or put it in a phone booth: with the legendary S printed on the chest… I mean… the hood, this sports car is ready to show its superpowers and put your opponents to the test. And the good news is that there is no Kryptonite in HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED™! This is a super car!  

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

70050000028624.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Aston Martin DB5 1963
70050000028624.description:
Here is a car with a license to... win! This splendid Aston Martin is nothing less than the iconic car featured in legendary action and spy movies. But the power of this luxury GT is anything but a secret! And just like a great spy, your rivals won't be able to catch you so easily. 

Behind its sleek vintage design lies a sporty soul that fears no challenge, with its amazing performance. As soon as your opponents see you on the track they will be very, very... agitated. Get behind the wheel now and be ready for victory, great victory.

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

70050000028627.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Street Fighter Blanka
70050000028627.description:
Unleash the brute force of this car inspired by Blanka, the world-famous character from Street Fighter. Just like Blanka, this VW Baja Bug has undergone a wild upgrade that makes it a real nightmare for any opponent. Bright green like the skin of Blanka, and with his (or should we say its?) signature vivid orange hair, this car is ready to make its way through the jungle… er, the track brawling for the first position! 

Blanka will strike you with electric performance leaving anyone behind in total shock! Overtake your rivals ferociously with predatorial rage! Follow your animal instinct and add it to your collection now!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

70050000028628.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Wonder Woman
70050000028628.description:
Lasso the competition and dominate the race like a real Amazon! Here is a super aerodynamic speedster inspired by one of the most beloved DC Comics characters ever: Wonder Woman! 
Its beautiful livery echoes the colors and design of her legendary costume, with the golden star-tiara on the roof and the iconic double W on the hood.

And what about performance? Well, we know that the Amazons were excellent horse riders, but here we are talking about tons of horsepower: push down on the gas pedal and earn your place among the gods of the race. It's no wonder you can't wait to drive it!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

70050000028629.name: HOT WHEELS™ - AcceleRacers Deora™ II
70050000028629.description:
Put yourself in the shoes (or more likely beach sandals) of Vert Wheeler and hop in this fabulous masterpiece on four wheels! Straight from the cult movie Highway 35 World Race, here is the legendary Deora™ II with the Wave Rippers livery. An evolution of the original 1968 Deora model, this racing car seems to be made for surfing the track with its two boards in the rear bed! 

Deora™ II will take you straight to the highest step of the podium to prove once again who is the World’s Best Driver. Get on board, ride the wave of success and… Hang Loose bro!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

70050000028630.name: HOT WHEELS™ - TMNT Leonardo
70050000028630.description:
COWABUNGA! If you are looking for a masterpiece on four-wheels you have come to the right place: straight from the world of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, here is the racing car inspired by Leonardo! With its green body, blue mask and the legendary double katana as the rear spoiler, HOT WHEELS™ - TMNT Leonardo will take you from the sewers to the top of the podium. 

Master the art of overtaking, draw phenomenal trajectories and shred the competition like a real warrior. We are pretty sure you've never seen a turtle this fast. Complete your collection now!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

70050000028651.name: Zoo pack
70050000028651.description: Change a look of the board and characters by customizing it with 20 additional setups!

70050000028858.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Tropical Wave Customization Pack
70050000028858.description:
Palm trees, waves, surfboards… you don't need to go too far to enjoy this paradise: HOT WHEELS™ - Tropical Wave Customization Pack will bring the magic of the ocean straight to your Basement! 

Includes 8 exclusive elements with a beach-life inspired design. Customize walls, floor, doors and your couch... don't you feel like you're on vacation already? But races never take a break so build your track here and get ready to make some waves! Your opponents might even enjoy the sweet sunny view, but they're in for the most bitter defeat! 

Also, this exclusive pack features 3 exclusive elements for your Unleashed Profile, with a dedicated icon, tag and background! Surf's up! 

This DLC includes: 

For the Basement: 
- 2 walls
- 2 floors 
- 1 door
- 1 decoration
- 1 couch
- 1 set of 4 posters

For the Unleashed Profile: 
- 1 icon
- 1 tag
- 1 background

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

70050000028867.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Rolling Boulders Module
70050000028867.description:
Rock 'n' Roll baby! And it has to be said, since we are actually talking about rocks. And boy, they do roll! HOT WHEELS™ - Rolling Boulders Module is an impressive boulder launcher that will add a rush of adrenaline to your race: from the base module, a giant boulder will randomly be thrown onto the track from 3 openings. You know the damage that a hail stone can do to your car? Well, now imagine a 5-meter stone! 

It will take lightning fast reflexes to avoid a devastating impact! Will you be able to overcome this obstacle? Will you be blown away? Nothing is written in stone so test yourself and prove that... YOU ROCK!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

70050000028868.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Pink Fashion Customization Pack
70050000028868.description:
If your rivals made you see red, after the race you might want to get some relaxation surrounded by more soothing shades of pink! So here is the perfect pack for you: 8 elements in the tones of pink to customize your Basement with fancy decorations and that fashion touch that will charm everyone. Even your toughest opponents! As they will be distracted by your Interior Designer skills, you can overtake them without mercy! Talk about Fashion Victims! So the prettier your Basement is, the better it is for your chances of winning! 

Also, this exclusive pack features 3 exclusive elements for your Unleashed Profile, with a dedicated icon, tag and background! Show off your style, not just in the race! 

This DLC includes: 

For the Basement: 
- 2 walls
- 2 floors 
- 1 door
- 1 decoration
- 1 couch
- 1 set of 4 posters

For the Unleashed Profile: 
- 1 icon
- 1 tag
- 1 background

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

70050000028870.name: HOT WHEELS™ - AcceleRacers Bassline™
70050000028870.description:
Make some noise for the arrival of this new racing car straight from the futuristic world of AcceleRacers! Driven by Shirako Takamoto and the only truck in the acclaimed series, Bassline™ is ready to make you feel (and hear!) all the thrills of victory thanks to its huge rear speakers and subwoofers: the perfect soundtrack… for your tracks! And whoever tries to stop you, will have to face the music! So get ready to step on the podium, also thanks to another kind of sound: those sweet notes of its powerful V10 engine. 

This vehicle cannot be missing in your collection, so turn up the volume and make your opponents tremble with HOT WHEELS™ - AcceleRacers Bassline™!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

70050000028871.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Dinopult Module
70050000028871.description:
Here is a new interactive module that will make your track go down in history. Well, actually... pre-history! Add HOT WHEELS™ - Dinopult Module to any track and get ready to jump into the Jurassic Era with this huge red stegosaurus. 

Race under its belly, between its massive legs, but be careful not to get caught by its unpredictable tail: pass through at the wrong time and you will be thrown into the air losing the lead of the race! And this could mean extinction for your hope of victory! Learn how to use it to your advantage to beat your rivals and you might find yourself landing on the podium!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

70050000028872.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Barbie™ Dream Camper™
70050000028872.description:
Don't be fooled by its appearance: the Barbie™ Dream Camper™ isn't your classic Sunday driver vehicle. Born for the outdoors, this compact and multifunctional RV will surprise you even on the longest indoor races. And if someone needs a vacation, it will be your rivals, after you overtake them on the finish line! 

On the other hand, the convenience of having a camper is that you can park it anywhere you want... especially on the top step of the podium. With Barbie™ Dream Camper™ your dreams of glory will finally come true! 

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

70050000028907.name: Fitness Boxing 2: Musical Journey
70050000028907.intro: Punch and jab to additional music with a new music pack* for the Fitness Boxing 2: Rhythm and Exercise game!
70050000028907.description:
Take a workout journey with a 10-track pack of tunes created just for this game. 

The Fitness Boxing 2: Musical Journey pack* includes 10 adventurous tunes that draw inspiration from around the globe. 

You can expect a variety of tunes that include groovy samba rhythms and twangy banjo beats.  

With this you can enjoy exercising while taking a musical trip across the world! 

You can also record up to 30 seconds of your own gameplay footage with the video recording option when working out to these tracks.

70050000029093.name: Sonic Colors: Ultimate - Ultimate Cosmetic Pack
70050000029093.description: Customize Sonic and stand out with exclusive gold and silver gloves and shoes,  an electric lightning boost and aura from the hit Sonic movie, and exclusive Sonic movie themed player icons

70050000029124.name: Fuga: Melodies of Steel - Deluxe Edition - In-Game Bonuses
70050000029124.intro: A dramatic action strategy RPG depicting hope and despair.
70050000029124.description:
'-Fuga: Melodies of Steel - Deluxe Edition
・Fuga: Melodies of Steel - In-Game Bonuses:
 ①Swimwear costumes for all characters (can be used during intermission and expedition)
 ②Dummy Soul for the Soul Cannon (can use the Soul Cannon 1 time without sacrificing a character)
 ③Set of items

70050000029130.name: "Special Stickers 4" sticker set
70050000029130.description:
Have fun communicating with other players using stickers!

This add-on contains:

- "Special Stickers 4" Sticker Set
These stickers depict cute versions of your favourite characters from Kamura Village!

After purchasing, speak to the Courier and select Add-on Content to receive the content. You will then be able to use it in the Chat menu.

70050000029157.name: Nijisanji VTubers: "Kuzuha, Sister Claire, and Debidebi Debiru" Collaboration Officer Data
70050000029157.description:
New officers appear in scenarios for the  "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

Note: Officer data added with this DLC cannot be edited.

This is a collaboration with the Nijisanji VTubers, namely Kuzuha, Sister Claire, and Debidebi Debiru.
Here is a brief profile of them: Kuzuha is an unemployed vampire who plays video games all day long while sponging on his parents; Sister Claire takes care of the sick, the poor, and orphans; and Debidebi Debiru aims to doom the mankind to corruption.
Please enjoy the unique newcomers joining the scene.

▼Added officers
Kuzuha, Sister Claire, and Debidebi Debiru

▼How to use
Select a scenario from Start New - Select Scenario screen, then select an officer from "Have Orig. Officers Appear" on the Officer Settings screen to have them appear in-game.
From "Position Orig. Officers", by placing the officer on a base, or having them serve a force, they will appear in-game.

©ANYCOLOR, Inc.

70050000029389.name: Asphalt 9: Legends – American Pack
70050000029389.description:
The American Season is here! 
Feel the adrenaline rush of racing American supercars with this limited-time DLC. Unlock the Ford GT, Dodge Viper ACR, and Ford Shelby GT350R, plus a load of resources to fuel your drive to the top!

This pack contains:
- 35 blueprints to unlock the Ford GT
- 35 blueprints to unlock the Dodge Viper ACR
- 20 blueprints to unlock the Ford Shelby GT350R
- 500,000 Credits
- 500 Tokens

70050000029424.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Holiday Season Customization Pack
70050000029424.description:
To really put yourself in full festive mood, there's nothing better than this special Holiday Season Customization Pack! Make your Basement and your Unleashed profile unique with 8 fantastic elements to decorate walls, floors, doors and give a Christmas touch to the room with decorations, sofa and themed posters included! And for your Unleashed profile, an icon, tag and dedicated background will take you to the heart of the celebrations.

But even if it's Christmas time, your rivals can expect no gifts from you! So get ready to beat them mercilessly even during the holidays on the tracks created in your new Christmassy Basement and unpack victory after victory.

This DLC contains:

For the Basement: 
- 2 walls
- 2 floors
- 1 door
- 1 decoration
- 1 couch
- 1 set of 4 posters

For the Unleashed Profile: 
- 1 icon
- 1 tag
- 1 background

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

70050000029425.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Spinning Tire Module
70050000029425.description:
The wheel of fortune is always spinning… but to overcome this obstacle on the track you will need much more than just luck: class, speed and lightning-fast reflexes will be your secret weapons! Add Spinning Tire Module to your track and test your timing with this giant tire that rotates around the track – choose the right moment to avoid its unstoppable spinning bar or you'll be blown away without mercy! There's no getting around it: this module can really decide the fate of the competition.

With HOT WHEELS™ - Spinning Tire Module… freewheeling fun is guaranteed!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

70050000029439.name: PAC-MAN™ 99 Custom Theme: HOPPING MAPPY
70050000029439.description:
Custom Theme "HOPPING MAPPY" will be playable by selecting SETTING＞CUSTOM THEME.

Hop back to the past with this retro theme!

70050000029545.name: DRAGON BALL Z: KAKAROT + A NEW POWER AWAKENS SET - D Medal (x10)
70050000029545.description:
Adds 10 D Medals to your inventory.
Spend D Medals to acquire Super Attacks at Training Grounds locations.

70050000029590.name: Toy Box
70050000029590.description: Play with your favorite toys! Some for girls, some for boys!

70050000029605.name: Experience x3 - Armed Emeth
70050000029605.description:
Experience gained in battles is tripled.
Settings can be changed in the menu under Shop > Additional Content section.

70050000029606.name: No Encounters - Armed Emeth
70050000029606.description:
Disables battle encounters.
Settings can be changed in the menu under Shop > Additional Content section.

70050000029616.name: HOT WHEELS™ - Multipack
70050000029616.description:
IMPORTANT NOTICE

This product is not available for purchase: it is exclusively included in HOT WHEELS™ - Ultimate Stunt Edition.
The products included in this DLC can be purchased separately.
HOT WHEELS™ - Multipack includes:
- HOT WHEELS™ - Customization Pack 6
- HOT WHEELS™ - Vehicle 17
- HOT WHEELS™ - Track Builder Module 6
- HOT WHEELS™ - Vehicle 18
- HOT WHEELS™ - Vehicle 19

70050000029617.name: PAC-MAN™ 99 Custom Theme: Splatterhouse: Wanpaku Graffiti
70050000029617.description:
Custom Theme "Splatterhouse: Wanpaku Graffiti" will be playable by selecting SETTING＞CUSTOM THEME.

Hop back to the past with this retro theme!

70050000029631.name: "Special Stickers 5" sticker set
70050000029631.description:
Have fun communicating with other players using stickers!

This add-on contains:

- "Special Stickers 5" Sticker Set
These quirky stickers depict some familiar items from around the village!

After purchasing, speak to the Courier and select Add-on Content to receive the content. You will then be able to use it in the Chat menu.

70050000029651.name: Illustrations in Gallery Full Open
70050000029651.intro: The "Gallery All Open Pack" is now available for those who want to view all the beautiful girl illustrations right now!
70050000029651.description:
When you purchase this pack, you will be able to see 45 illustrations of the main content and 3 illustrations of the additional content in the gallery.

*The "Illustrations in Gallery Full Open" does not allow you to play the high difficulty stages.

70050000029652.name: High difficulty stage addition
70050000029652.intro: Additional stages are impossible to clear! High Difficulty Stage Pack" is now available!
70050000029652.description: This pack allows you to play "3 stages". The three additional stages are "Rosa Haula", "Adrianna Diaz", and "Liselot Beijer". Clear the more difficult stages and get gorgeous character illustrations!

70050000029742.name: Season Pass Support Set
70050000029742.description:
A special set that contains:
- 1,000,000 HL
- 50,000 Mana
- 2x Boost Ticket x1
- 5x Boost Ticket x1
- 10x Boost Ticket x1

70050000029856.name: DRAGON BALL Z: KAKAROT + A NEW POWER AWAKENS SET Smiling Ultra Mega Roast
70050000029856.description: Use this item to increase a character's stats!

70050000029857.name: DRAGON BALL Z: KAKAROT + A NEW POWER AWAKENS SET A Competitive Party with Friends
70050000029857.description:
Allows you to play "A Competitive Party with Friends," a sub story revolving around Goku and his allies!

Note: This sub story is available after Chapter 3: Cell Saga Episode 2.

70050000029858.name: DRAGON BALL Z: KAKAROT + A NEW POWER AWAKENS SET The Mystical Member of the Ginyu Force
70050000029858.description:
Allows early access to fight former Ginyu Force member Bonyu in the Training Room at Capsule Corporation.

Note: The training menu can also be unlocked by progressing through the story.
This content is available after Chapter 3: Cell Saga Episode 2.
